From Cdcl Require Import Itauto. #[local] Tactic Notation "itauto" := itauto auto.
From stdpp Require Import finite.
From Coq Require Import FinFun.
From VLSM.Lib Require Import Preamble.

Utility lemmas about lists

A list is empty if it has no members 
X: Type
l: list X
(âˆ€ v : X, Â¬ In v l) â†’ l = []


X: Type
l: list X
(âˆ€ v : X, Â¬ In v l) â†’ l = []

  
X: Type
l: list X
(âˆ€ v : X, Â¬ In v l) â†’ l = []

  
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
(âˆ€ v : X, Â¬ In v (a :: l)) â†’ a :: l = []

  
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
(âˆ€ v : X, Â¬ (a = v âˆ¨ In v l)) â†’ a :: l = []
 
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
H: âˆ€ v : X, Â¬ (a = v âˆ¨ In v l)
a :: l = []
 
X: Type
a: X
l: list X
H: âˆ€ v : X, Â¬ (a = v âˆ¨ In v l)
a = a âˆ¨ In a l
 by left.
Qed.
It is decidable whether a list is null or not 
S: Type
l: list S
Decision (l = [])


S: Type
l: list S
Decision (l = [])

  by destruct l; [left | right].
Qed.
A list is either null or it can be decomposed into an initial prefix and a last element. 
S: Type
l: list S
{l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}} + {l = []}


S: Type
l: list S
{l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}} + {l = []}

  
S: Type
l: list S
e: l = []
{l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}} + {l = []}
S: Type
l: list S
n: l â‰  []
{l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}} + {l = []}

  
S: Type
l: list S
e: l = []
{l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}} + {l = []}
 by right.
  
S: Type
l: list S
n: l â‰  []
{l' : list S & {a : S | l = l' ++ [a]}} + {l = []}
 by left; apply exists_last in n.
Qed.
destructs a list in l in either null or a prefix l' and a last element a with an equation Heq stating that l = l' ++ [a]. 
Ltac destruct_list_last l l' a Heq :=
 destruct (has_last_or_null l) as [[l' [a Heq]] | Heq]; rewrite Heq in *; swap 1 2.


S: Type
l: list S
a: S
l ++ [a] â‰  []


S: Type
l: list S
a: S
l ++ [a] â‰  []

  by destruct l.
Qed.

Definition last_error {S} (l : list S) : option S :=
  match l with
  | [] => None
  | a :: t => Some (List.last t a)
  end.


S: Type
âˆ€ (random a b : S) (l : list S),
  List.last (a :: b :: l) random =
  List.last (b :: l) random


S: Type
âˆ€ (random a b : S) (l : list S),
  List.last (a :: b :: l) random =
  List.last (b :: l) random
 done. Qed.


S: Type
âˆ€ (random a b c : S) (l : list S),
  List.last (a :: b :: c :: l) random =
  List.last (b :: a :: c :: l) random


S: Type
âˆ€ (random a b c : S) (l : list S),
  List.last (a :: b :: c :: l) random =
  List.last (b :: a :: c :: l) random

  
S: Type
random, h1, h2, s: S
tl: list S
List.last (h1 :: h2 :: s :: tl) random =
List.last (h2 :: h1 :: s :: tl) random

  by induction tl as [| hd tl IHl].
Qed.


X: Type
âˆ€ (hd1 hd2 d1 d2 : X) (tl : list X),
  List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: tl) d1 =
  List.last (hd2 :: tl) d2


X: Type
âˆ€ (hd1 hd2 d1 d2 : X) (tl : list X),
  List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: tl) d1 =
  List.last (hd2 :: tl) d2

  
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2: X
tl: list X
List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: tl) d2
 
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2, a: X
tl: list X
IHtl: List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: tl) d2
List.last (hd1 :: hd2 :: a :: tl) d1 =
List.last (hd2 :: a :: tl) d2

  
X: Type
hd1, hd2, d1, d2, a: X
tl: list X
IHtl: match tl with
| [] => hd2
| _ :: _ => List.last tl d1
end =
match tl with
| [] => hd2
| _ :: _ => List.last tl d2
end
match tl with
| [] => a
| _ :: _ => List.last tl d1
end =
match tl with
| [] => a
| _ :: _ => List.last tl d2
end
 by destruct tl.
Qed.


S: Type
âˆ€ (random a : S) (l : list S),
  List.last (a :: l) random = List.last l a


S: Type
âˆ€ (random a : S) (l : list S),
  List.last (a :: l) random = List.last l a

  
S: Type
random, a, a0: S
l: list S
IHl: List.last (a :: l) random = List.last l a
List.last (a :: a0 :: l) random =
List.last (a0 :: l) a

  
S: Type
random, a, a0, s: S
l: list S
IHl: List.last (a :: s :: l) random =
List.last (s :: l) a
List.last (a :: a0 :: s :: l) random =
List.last (a0 :: s :: l) a

  by rewrite swap_head_last, unfold_last_hd, IHl, unfold_last_hd.
Qed.


A: Type
l1, l2: list A
def: A
List.last (l1 ++ l2) def =
List.last l2 (List.last l1 def)


A: Type
l1, l2: list A
def: A
List.last (l1 ++ l2) def =
List.last l2 (List.last l1 def)

  
A: Type
l1, l2: list A
âˆ€ def : A,
  List.last (l1 ++ l2) def =
  List.last l2 (List.last l1 def)

  
A: Type
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ def : A,
  List.last (l1 ++ l2) def =
  List.last l2 (List.last l1 def)
âˆ€ def : A,
  List.last ((a :: l1) ++ l2) def =
  List.last l2 (List.last (a :: l1) def)

  
A: Type
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ def : A,
  List.last (l1 ++ l2) def =
  List.last l2 (List.last l1 def)
def: A
List.last ((a :: l1) ++ l2) def =
List.last l2 (List.last (a :: l1) def)
 by rewrite <- !app_comm_cons, !unroll_last.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
h: A
t: list A
def: B
List.last (map f (h :: t)) def = f (List.last t h)


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
h: A
t: list A
def: B
List.last (map f (h :: t)) def = f (List.last t h)

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
t: list A
âˆ€ (def : B) (h : A),
  List.last (map f (h :: t)) def = f (List.last t h)

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
a: A
t: list A
IHt: âˆ€ (def : B) (h : A), List.last (map f (h :: t)) def = f (List.last t h)
def: B
h: A
List.last (map f (h :: a :: t)) def =
f (List.last (a :: t) h)

  by rewrite map_cons, !unroll_last.
Qed.


S: Type
l: list S
s, random: S
Herr: last_error l = Some s
List.last l random = s


S: Type
l: list S
s, random: S
Herr: last_error l = Some s
List.last l random = s

  by destruct l; [|inversion Herr; apply unroll_last].
Qed.


âˆ€ (A : Type) (l : list A), incl l [] â†’ l = []


âˆ€ (A : Type) (l : list A), incl l [] â†’ l = []

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
H: incl (a :: l) []
a :: l = []

  by destruct (H a); left.
Qed.


A: Type
âˆ€ (l : list A) (a : A),
  incl l [a] â†’ âˆ€ b : A, In b l â†’ b = a


A: Type
âˆ€ (l : list A) (a : A),
  incl l [a] â†’ âˆ€ b : A, In b l â†’ b = a

  
A: Type
l: list A
a: A
H: incl l [a]
b: A
H0: In b l
b = a
 
A: Type
l: list A
a, b: A
H0: In b (b :: l)
H: incl (b :: l) [a]
IHl: incl l [a] â†’ In b l â†’ b = a
b = a
A: Type
a0: A
l: list A
a: A
H: incl (a0 :: l) [a]
b: A
H0: In b (a0 :: l)
IHl: incl l [a] â†’ In b l â†’ b = a
H1: In b l
b = a

  
A: Type
l: list A
a, b: A
H0: In b (b :: l)
H: incl (b :: l) [a]
IHl: incl l [a] â†’ In b l â†’ b = a
b = a
 destruct (H b); [by left | done | inversion H1].
  
A: Type
a0: A
l: list A
a: A
H: incl (a0 :: l) [a]
b: A
H0: In b (a0 :: l)
IHl: incl l [a] â†’ In b l â†’ b = a
H1: In b l
b = a
 
A: Type
a0: A
l: list A
a: A
H: incl (a0 :: l) [a]
b: A
H0: In b (a0 :: l)
IHl: incl l [a] â†’ In b l â†’ b = a
H1: In b l
incl l [a]

    
A: Type
a0: A
l: list A
a: A
H: incl (a0 :: l) [a]
b: A
H0: In b (a0 :: l)
IHl: incl l [a] â†’ In b l â†’ b = a
H1: In b l
incl l (a0 :: l)

    
A: Type
a0: A
l: list A
a: A
H: incl (a0 :: l) [a]
b: A
H0: In b (a0 :: l)
IHl: incl l [a] â†’ In b l â†’ b = a
H1: In b l
incl l l
 apply incl_refl.
Qed.

Hsomething: Exists P l
âˆƒ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  âˆ§ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    âˆ§ Â¬ Exists P prefix

    itauto.

prefix, suffix: list A

Hf: P first
Hnone_before: Â¬ Exists P prefix
n: Â¬ P a
âˆƒ (prefix0 suffix0 : list A) (first0 : A),
  P first0
  âˆ§ a :: prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix =
    prefix0 ++ [first0] ++ suffix0
    âˆ§ Â¬ Exists P prefix0

    
A: Type
a: A
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
prefix, suffix: list A
first: A
Hf: P first
Hnone_before: Â¬ Exists P prefix
n: Â¬ P a
P first
âˆ§ a :: prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix =
  (a :: prefix) ++ [first] ++ suffix
  âˆ§ Â¬ Exists P (a :: prefix)

    
A: Type
a: A
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
prefix, suffix: list A
first: A
Hf: P first
Hnone_before: Â¬ Exists P prefix
n: Â¬ P a
P first
âˆ§ a :: prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix =
  (a :: prefix) ++ [first] ++ suffix
  âˆ§ Â¬ (P a âˆ¨ Exists P prefix)

    itauto.
Qed.


âˆ€ (A : Type) (x y : A) (l : list A),
  x âˆˆ l â†’ y âˆ‰ l â†’ x â‰  y


âˆ€ (A : Type) (x y : A) (l : list A),
  x âˆˆ l â†’ y âˆ‰ l â†’ x â‰  y
 itauto congruence. Qed.

Definition inb {A} (Aeq_dec : forall x y:A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A) :=
  if in_dec Aeq_dec x xs then true else false.


X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
âˆ€ (l : list X) (x : X),
  In x l â†” inb decide_eq x l = true


X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
âˆ€ (l : list X) (x : X),
  In x l â†” inb decide_eq x l = true

  
X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
s: list X
msg: X
In msg s â†” inb decide_eq msg s = true

  
X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
s: list X
msg: X
In msg s
â†” (if in_dec decide_eq msg s then true else false) =
  true

  destruct (in_dec _ _ _); itauto congruence.
Qed.


X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
âˆ€ (l : list X) (x : X), In x l â†” inb decide_eq x l


X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
âˆ€ (l : list X) (x : X), In x l â†” inb decide_eq x l

  
X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
s: list X
msg: X
In msg s â†” inb decide_eq msg s

  by rewrite in_correct, Is_true_iff_eq_true.
Qed.


X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
âˆ€ (l : list X) (x : X),
  Â¬ In x l â†” inb decide_eq x l = false


X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
âˆ€ (l : list X) (x : X),
  Â¬ In x l â†” inb decide_eq x l = false

  
X: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision X
s: list X
msg: X
Â¬ In msg s â†” inb decide_eq msg s = false

  by rewrite in_correct, not_true_iff_false.
Qed.

Definition inclb
  `{EqDecision A}
  (l1 l2 : list A)
  : bool
  := forallb (fun x : A => inb decide_eq x l2) l1.


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l1, l2: list A
incl l1 l2 â†” inclb l1 l2 = true


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l1, l2: list A
incl l1 l2 â†” inclb l1 l2 = true

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l1, l2: list A
incl l1 l2
â†” forallb (Î» x : A, inb decide_eq x l2) l1 = true

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l1, l2: list A
incl l1 l2
â†” (âˆ€ x : A, In x l1 â†’ inb decide_eq x l2 = true)

  by split; intros Hincl x Hx; apply in_correct; apply Hincl.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A
âˆ€ s s' : list B, incl s s' â†’ incl (map f s) (map f s')


A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A
âˆ€ s s' : list B, incl s s' â†’ incl (map f s) (map f s')

  
A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A
s, s': list B
Hincl: incl s s'
fx: A
Hin: In fx (map f s)
In fx (map f s')

  
A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A
s, s': list B
Hincl: incl s s'
fx: A
Hin: In fx (map f s)
âˆƒ x : B, f x = fx âˆ§ In x s'

  
A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A
s, s': list B
Hincl: incl s s'
fx: A
x: B
Heq: f x = fx
Hin: In x s
âˆƒ x : B, f x = fx âˆ§ In x s'
 eauto.
Qed.

Definition app_cons {A}
  (a : A)
  (l : list A)
  : [a] ++ l = a :: l
  := eq_refl.


A: Type
âˆ€ l1 l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ List.NoDup l1


A: Type
âˆ€ l1 l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ List.NoDup l1

  
A: Type
l2: list A
H: List.NoDup ([] ++ l2)
List.NoDup []
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ List.NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: List.NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
List.NoDup (a :: l1)

  
A: Type
l2: list A
H: List.NoDup ([] ++ l2)
List.NoDup []
 constructor.
  
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ List.NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: List.NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
List.NoDup (a :: l1)
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ List.NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: List.NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
x: A
l: list A
H2: Â¬ In a (l1 ++ l2)
H3: List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
H0: x = a
H1: l = l1 ++ l2
List.NoDup (a :: l1)
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ List.NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: List.NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
x: A
l: list A
H2: Â¬ In a (l1 ++ l2)
H3: List.NoDup l1
H0: x = a
H1: l = l1 ++ l2
List.NoDup (a :: l1)
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ List.NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: List.NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
x: A
l: list A
H2: Â¬ In a (l1 ++ l2)
H3: List.NoDup l1
H0: x = a
H1: l = l1 ++ l2
Â¬ In a l1

    
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ List.NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: List.NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
x: A
l: list A
H2: Â¬ (In a l1 âˆ¨ In a l2)
H3: List.NoDup l1
H0: x = a
H1: l = l1 ++ l2
Â¬ In a l1
 itauto.
Qed.


A: Type
âˆ€ l1 l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ List.NoDup l2


A: Type
âˆ€ l1 l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ List.NoDup l2

  
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ List.NoDup l2
l2: list A
H: List.NoDup (a :: l1 ++ l2)
List.NoDup l2

  
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ l2 : list A,
  List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ List.NoDup l2
l2: list A
H: List.NoDup (a :: l1 ++ l2)
x: A
l: list A
H2: Â¬ In a (l1 ++ l2)
H3: List.NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
H0: x = a
H1: l = l1 ++ l2
List.NoDup l2
 auto.
Qed.


A: Type
âˆ€ (l : list A) (x dummy : A),
  List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy = x


A: Type
âˆ€ (l : list A) (x dummy : A),
  List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy = x

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ x dummy : A, List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy = x
x, dummy: A
List.last ((a :: l) ++ [x]) dummy = x

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ x dummy : A, List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy = x
x, dummy: A
List.last (a :: l ++ [x]) dummy = x
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ x dummy : A, List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy = x
x, dummy: A
List.last (a :: l ++ [x]) dummy =
List.last (l ++ [x]) dummy

  by destruct l.
Qed.


A: Type
âˆ€ (l : list A) (x : A), last_error (l ++ [x]) = Some x


A: Type
âˆ€ (l : list A) (x : A), last_error (l ++ [x]) = Some x

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
âˆ€ x : A, Some (List.last (l ++ [x]) a) = Some x

  by intros; rewrite last_is_last.
Qed.
Polymorphic list library 
Fixpoint is_member {W} `{StrictlyComparable W} (w : W) (l : list W) : bool :=
  match l with
  | [] => false
  | hd :: tl => match compare w hd with
              | Eq => true
              | _ => is_member w tl
              end
  end.

Definition compareb {A} `{StrictlyComparable A} (a1 a2 : A) : bool :=
  match compare a1 a2 with
  | Eq => true
  | _ => false
  end.


W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
âˆ€ (l : list W) (w : W), is_member w l = true â†” In w l


W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
âˆ€ (l : list W) (w : W), is_member w l = true â†” In w l

  
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
l: list W
w: W
is_member w l = true â†” In w l

  
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
w: W
false = true â†” False
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true â†” In w tl
match compare w hd with
| Eq => true
| _ => is_member w tl
end = true â†” hd = w âˆ¨ In w tl

  
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
w: W
false = true â†” False
 itauto congruence.
  
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true â†” In w tl
match compare w hd with
| Eq => true
| _ => is_member w tl
end = true â†” hd = w âˆ¨ In w tl
 
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
hd: W
tl: list W
w: W
IHl: is_member w tl = true â†” In w tl
match CompOpp (compare hd w) with
| Eq => true
| _ => is_member w tl
end = true â†” compare hd w = Eq âˆ¨ In w tl

    destruct (compare hd w) eqn: Hcmp; cbn; itauto congruence.
Qed.


W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
âˆ€ (l : list W) (w : W),
  is_member w l = false â†” Â¬ In w l


W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
âˆ€ (l : list W) (w : W),
  is_member w l = false â†” Â¬ In w l

  
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
l: list W
w: W
is_member w l = false â†” Â¬ In w l

  
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
l: list W
w: W
is_member w l = false â†” is_member w l â‰  true

  
W: Type
H: StrictlyComparable W
l: list W
w: W
is_member w l â‰  true â†’ is_member w l = false

  apply not_true_is_false.
Qed.


X: Type
âˆ€ (l1 l2 : list X) (x : X),
  In x (l1 ++ l2) â†” In x (l2 ++ l1)


X: Type
âˆ€ (l1 l2 : list X) (x : X),
  In x (l1 ++ l2) â†” In x (l2 ++ l1)

  intros l1 l2 x; split; intro H_in;
  apply in_or_app; apply in_app_or in H_in;
    destruct H_in as [cat | dog];
    itauto.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
Hlast: S n = length l
_last: A
nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
Hlast: S n = length l
_last: A
nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
Hlast: S n = length l
âˆ€ _last : A, nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)

  
A: Type
n: nat
âˆ€ l : list A,
  S n = length l
  â†’ âˆ€ _last : A,
      nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)

  
A: Type
l: list A
Hlast: 1 = length l
_last: A
nth_error l 0 = Some (List.last l _last)
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: âˆ€ l : list A,
  S n = length l
  â†’ âˆ€ _last : A,
      nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)
l: list A
Hlast: S (S n) = length l
_last: A
nth_error l (S n) = Some (List.last l _last)

  
A: Type
l: list A
Hlast: 1 = length l
_last: A
nth_error l 0 = Some (List.last l _last)
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
Hlast: 1 = length (a :: l)
_last: A
H0: 0 = length l
nth_error (a :: l) 0 = Some (List.last (a :: l) _last)
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
Hlast: 1 = length (a :: l)
_last: A
H0: length l = 0
nth_error (a :: l) 0 = Some (List.last (a :: l) _last)

    
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
Hlast: 1 = length (a :: l)
_last: A
H0: l = []
nth_error (a :: l) 0 = Some (List.last (a :: l) _last)
 by subst.
  
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: âˆ€ l : list A,
S n = length l â†’ âˆ€ _last : A, nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)
l: list A
Hlast: S (S n) = length l
_last: A
nth_error l (S n) = Some (List.last l _last)

n: nat

a: A

Hlast: S (S n) = length (a :: l)
_last: A
H0: S n = length l
nth_error (a :: l) (S n) =
Some (List.last (a :: l) _last)

    
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A

A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
_last: A
IHn: nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)
a: A
Hlast: S (S n) = length (a :: l)
H0: S n = length l
nth_error l n = Some (List.last l a)
 
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
_last: A
IHn: nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)
a: A
Hlast: S (S n) = length (a :: l)
H0: S n = length l
Some (List.last l _last) = Some (List.last l a)
 
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
_last: A
IHn: nth_error l n = Some (List.last l _last)
a: A
Hlast: S (S n) = length (a :: l)
H0: S n = length l
List.last l _last = List.last l a

    
A: Type
n: nat
a0: A
l: list A
_last: A
IHn: nth_error (a0 :: l) n =
Some (List.last (a0 :: l) _last)
a: A
Hlast: S (S n) = length (a :: a0 :: l)
H0: S n = length (a0 :: l)
H1: n = length l
List.last (a0 :: l) _last = List.last (a0 :: l) a

    by rewrite !unroll_last.
Qed.

Fixpoint list_suffix
  {A : Type}
  (l : list A)
  (n : nat)
  {struct n}
  : list A
  := match n,l with
    | 0,_ => l
    | _,[] => []
    | S n, a :: l => list_suffix l n
    end.


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
l: list A
n: nat
map f (list_suffix l n) = list_suffix (map f l) n


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
l: list A
n: nat
map f (list_suffix l n) = list_suffix (map f l) n

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
n: nat
âˆ€ l : list A,
  map f (list_suffix l n) = list_suffix (map f l) n
 
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
map f (list_suffix [] 0) = list_suffix (map f []) 0
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
a: A
l: list A
map f (list_suffix (a :: l) 0) =
list_suffix (map f (a :: l)) 0
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
n: nat
IHn: âˆ€ l : list A, map f (list_suffix l n) = list_suffix (map f l) n
map f (list_suffix [] (S n)) =
list_suffix (map f []) (S n)
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
n: nat
IHn: âˆ€ l : list A, map f (list_suffix l n) = list_suffix (map f l) n
a: A
l: list A
map f (list_suffix (a :: l) (S n)) =
list_suffix (map f (a :: l)) (S n)
 
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
n: nat
IHn: âˆ€ l : list A, map f (list_suffix l n) = list_suffix (map f l) n
a: A
l: list A
map f (list_suffix (a :: l) (S n)) =
list_suffix (map f (a :: l)) (S n)
 apply IHn.
Qed.

Fixpoint list_prefix
  {A : Type}
  (l : list A)
  (n : nat)
  : list A
  := match n,l with
    | 0,_ => []
    | _,[] => []
    | S n, a :: l => a :: list_prefix l n
    end.


A: Type
l, left, right: list A
left_len: nat
Hlen: left_len = length left
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
list_prefix l left_len = left


A: Type
l, left, right: list A
left_len: nat
Hlen: left_len = length left
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
list_prefix l left_len = left

  
A: Type
left, right: list A
left_len: nat
Hlen: left_len = length left
âˆ€ l : list A,
  l = left ++ right â†’ list_prefix l left_len = left

  
A: Type
right: list A
left_len: nat
âˆ€ left : list A,
  left_len = length left
  â†’ âˆ€ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      â†’ list_prefix l left_len = left

  
A: Type
left_len: nat
âˆ€ right left : list A,
  left_len = length left
  â†’ âˆ€ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      â†’ list_prefix l left_len = left

  
A: Type
âˆ€ (left_len : nat) (right left : list A),
  left_len = length left
  â†’ âˆ€ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      â†’ list_prefix l left_len = left

  
A: Type
âˆ€ right left : list A,
  0 = length left
  â†’ âˆ€ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right â†’ list_prefix l 0 = left
A: Type
left_len: nat
IHleft_len: âˆ€ right left : list A,
  left_len = length left
  â†’ âˆ€ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      â†’ list_prefix l left_len = left
âˆ€ right left : list A,
  S left_len = length left
  â†’ âˆ€ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      â†’ list_prefix l (S left_len) = left

  
A: Type
âˆ€ right left : list A,
  0 = length left
  â†’ âˆ€ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right â†’ list_prefix l 0 = left
 
A: Type
right, left: list A
Hlen: 0 = length left
l: list A
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
list_prefix l 0 = left

    
A: Type
right, left: list A
Hlen: length left = 0
l: list A
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
list_prefix l 0 = left

    
A: Type
right, left: list A
Hlen: left = []
l: list A
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
list_prefix l 0 = left

    
A: Type
right, left: list A
Hlen: left = []
l: list A
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
list_prefix l 0 = []

    
A: Type
right, left: list A
Hlen: left = []
l: list A
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
(fix list_prefix
   (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) {struct l} :
     list A :=
   match n with
   | 0 => []
   | S n0 =>
       match l with
       | [] => []
       | a :: l0 => a :: list_prefix A l0 n0
       end
   end) A l 0 = []

    by destruct l.
  
A: Type
left_len: nat
IHleft_len: âˆ€ right left : list A,
  left_len = length left
  â†’ âˆ€ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      â†’ list_prefix l left_len = left
âˆ€ right left : list A,
  S left_len = length left
  â†’ âˆ€ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      â†’ list_prefix l (S left_len) = left
 
A: Type

IHleft_len: âˆ€ right left : list A,
  left_len = length left
  â†’ âˆ€ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      â†’ list_prefix l left_len = left
right, left: list A
Hlen: S left_len = length left
l: list A
Hsplit: l = left ++ right
list_prefix l (S left_len) = left

    
A: Type
left_len: nat
IHleft_len: âˆ€ right left : list A,
  left_len = length left
  â†’ âˆ€ l : list A,
      l = left ++ right
      â†’ list_prefix l left_len = left
right: list A
a: A
left: list A
Hlen: S left_len = length (a :: left)
l: list A
Hsplit: l = (a :: left) ++ right
list_prefix l (S left_len) = a :: left

A: Type

H: left_len = length left

a :: left

    
A: Type
left_len: nat
right, left: list A
IHleft_len: list_prefix (left ++ right) left_len =
left
a: A
Hlen: S left_len = length (a :: left)
l: list A
Hsplit: l = (a :: left) ++ right
H: left_len = length left
a :: list_prefix (left ++ right) left_len = a :: left

    by rewrite IHleft_len.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
l: list A
n: nat
map f (list_prefix l n) = list_prefix (map f l) n


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
l: list A
n: nat
map f (list_prefix l n) = list_prefix (map f l) n

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
n: nat
âˆ€ l : list A,
  map f (list_prefix l n) = list_prefix (map f l) n
 
A, B: Type

map f (list_prefix [] 0) = list_prefix (map f []) 0
A, B: Type

l: list A

list_prefix (map f (a :: l)) 0
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
n: nat
IHn: âˆ€ l : list A, map f (list_prefix l n) = list_prefix (map f l) n
map f (list_prefix [] (S n)) =
list_prefix (map f []) (S n)
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B

a: A

list_prefix (map f (a :: l)) (S n)
 
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
n: nat

a: A
l: list A
map f (list_prefix (a :: l) (S n)) =
list_prefix (map f (a :: l)) (S n)
 by cbn; rewrite IHn.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
Hlen: n â‰¤ length l
length (list_prefix l n) = n


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
Hlen: n â‰¤ length l
length (list_prefix l n) = n

  
A: Type
n: nat
âˆ€ l : list A,
  n â‰¤ length l â†’ length (list_prefix l n) = n

  induction n; intros [|a l] Hlen; cbn in *
  ; [done | done | inversion Hlen | rewrite IHn; lia].
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
length (list_suffix l n) = length l - n


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
length (list_suffix l n) = length l - n

  
A: Type
n: nat
âˆ€ l : list A, length (list_suffix l n) = length l - n
 
A: Type
length (list_suffix [] 0) = length [] - 0
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
length (list_suffix (a :: l) 0) = length (a :: l) - 0
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: âˆ€ l : list A, length (list_suffix l n) = length l - n
length (list_suffix [] (S n)) = length [] - S n
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: âˆ€ l : list A, length (list_suffix l n) = length l - n
a: A
l: list A
length (list_suffix (a :: l) (S n)) =
length (a :: l) - S n
 
A: Type
n: nat
IHn: âˆ€ l : list A, length (list_suffix l n) = length l - n
a: A
l: list A
length (list_suffix (a :: l) (S n)) =
length (a :: l) - S n
 apply IHn.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 â‰¤ n2
list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1


A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 â‰¤ n2
list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1

  
A: Type
l: list A
n2: nat
âˆ€ n1 : nat,
  n1 â‰¤ n2
  â†’ list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 =
    list_prefix l n1
 
A: Type
l: list A
âˆ€ n2 n1 : nat,
  n1 â‰¤ n2
  â†’ list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 =
    list_prefix l n1

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ n2 n1 : nat, n1 â‰¤ n2 â†’ list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
n1: nat
Hn: S n1 â‰¤ 0
list_prefix (list_prefix (a :: l) 0) (S n1) =
list_prefix (a :: l) (S n1)
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ n2 n1 : nat, n1 â‰¤ n2 â†’ list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
n2, n1: nat
Hn: S n1 â‰¤ S n2
list_prefix (list_prefix (a :: l) (S n2)) (S n1) =
list_prefix (a :: l) (S n1)

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ n2 n1 : nat, n1 â‰¤ n2 â†’ list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
n1: nat
Hn: S n1 â‰¤ 0
list_prefix (list_prefix (a :: l) 0) (S n1) =
list_prefix (a :: l) (S n1)
 inversion Hn.
  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ n2 n1 : nat, n1 â‰¤ n2 â†’ list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
n2, n1: nat
Hn: S n1 â‰¤ S n2
list_prefix (list_prefix (a :: l) (S n2)) (S n1) =
list_prefix (a :: l) (S n1)
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ n2 n1 : nat, n1 â‰¤ n2 â†’ list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
n2, n1: nat
Hn: S n1 â‰¤ S n2
a :: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 =
a :: list_prefix l n1
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ n2 n1 : nat, n1 â‰¤ n2 â†’ list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
n2, n1: nat
Hn: S n1 â‰¤ S n2
list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ n2 n1 : nat, n1 â‰¤ n2 â†’ list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
n2, n1: nat
Hn: S n1 â‰¤ S n2
n1 â‰¤ n2
 lia.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l

  
A: Type
l: list A
âˆ€ n : nat, list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l
 
A: Type
list_prefix [] 0 ++ list_suffix [] 0 = []
A: Type
n: nat
list_prefix [] (S n) ++ list_suffix [] (S n) = []
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ n : nat, list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l
list_prefix (a :: l) 0 ++ list_suffix (a :: l) 0 =
a :: l
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ n : nat, list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l
n: nat
list_prefix (a :: l) (S n) ++
list_suffix (a :: l) (S n) = a :: l
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ n : nat, list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l
n: nat
list_prefix (a :: l) (S n) ++
list_suffix (a :: l) (S n) = a :: l

  
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ n : nat, list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l
n: nat
a :: list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = a :: l
 
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ n : nat, list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l
n: nat
list_prefix l n ++ list_suffix l n = l
 apply IHl.
Qed.

Definition list_segment
  {A : Type}
  (l : list A)
  (n1 n2 : nat)
  := list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1.


A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 â‰¤ n2
list_prefix l n1 ++
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_suffix l n2 = l


A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 â‰¤ n2
list_prefix l n1 ++
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_suffix l n2 = l

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 â‰¤ n2
list_prefix l n1 ++
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_suffix l n2 =
list_prefix l n2 ++ list_suffix l n2

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 â‰¤ n2
(list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n2) ++
list_suffix l n2 =
list_prefix l n2 ++ list_suffix l n2

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 â‰¤ n2
list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n2 =
list_prefix l n2

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 â‰¤ n2
list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 =
list_prefix l n2

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 â‰¤ n2
list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 =
list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 ++
list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 â‰¤ n2
list_prefix l n1 = list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hn: n1 â‰¤ n2
list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1

  by apply list_prefix_prefix.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
P a


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
P a

  by inversion Hs.
Defined.


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
Forall P l


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
Forall P l

  by inversion Hs.
Defined.


list_annotate: âˆ€ (A : Type) (P : A â†’ Prop) 
  (Pdec : âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A),
  Forall P l â†’ list (dsig P)
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
list (dsig P)


list_annotate: âˆ€ (A : Type) (P : A â†’ Prop) 
  (Pdec : âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A),
  Forall P l â†’ list (dsig P)
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
list (dsig P)

  
list_annotate: âˆ€ (A : Type) (P : A â†’ Prop) 
  (Pdec : âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A),
  Forall P l â†’ list (dsig P)
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hs: Forall P []
list (dsig P)
list_annotate: âˆ€ (A : Type) (P : A â†’ Prop) 
  (Pdec : âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A),
  Forall P l â†’ list (dsig P)
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
list (dsig P)

  
list_annotate: âˆ€ (A : Type) (P : A â†’ Prop) 
  (Pdec : âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A),
  Forall P l â†’ list (dsig P)
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hs: Forall P []
list (dsig P)
 exact [].
  
list_annotate: âˆ€ (A : Type) (P : A â†’ Prop) 
  (Pdec : âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A),
  Forall P l â†’ list (dsig P)
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
list (dsig P)

  exact ((dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)) :: list_annotate A P Pdec l (Forall_tl Hs)).
Defined.


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
length (list_annotate P l Hs) = length l


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
length (list_annotate P l Hs) = length l

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
IHl: âˆ€ Hs : Forall P l,
  length (list_annotate P l Hs) = length l
length (list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs) = length (a :: l)

  by cbn; rewrite IHl.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs, Hs': Forall P l
list_annotate P l Hs = list_annotate P l Hs'


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs, Hs': Forall P l
list_annotate P l Hs = list_annotate P l Hs'

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
âˆ€ Hs Hs' : Forall P l,
  list_annotate P l Hs = list_annotate P l Hs'

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ Hs Hs' : Forall P l,
  list_annotate P l Hs = list_annotate P l Hs'
âˆ€ Hs Hs' : Forall P (a :: l),
  list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs =
  list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs'

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ Hs Hs' : Forall P l,
  list_annotate P l Hs = list_annotate P l Hs'
Hs, Hs': Forall P (a :: l)
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
:: list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs) =
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs')
:: list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs')

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ Hs Hs' : Forall P l,
  list_annotate P l Hs = list_annotate P l Hs'
Hs, Hs': Forall P (a :: l)
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs) = dexist a (Forall_hd Hs')

  by apply dsig_eq.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l1: list A
Hl1: Forall P l1
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P l2
list_annotate P l1 Hl1 = list_annotate P l2 Hl2
â†” l1 = l2


A: Type

l2: list A

â†” l1 = l2

  
A: Type

Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)

l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P l2
list_annotate P l1 Hl1 = list_annotate P l2 Hl2
â†’ l1 = l2

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l1: list A
âˆ€ (Hl1 : Forall P l1) (l2 : list A) (Hl2 : Forall P l2),
  list_annotate P l1 Hl1 = list_annotate P l2 Hl2
  â†’ l1 = l2

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hl1, Hl2: Forall P []
H: [] = []
[] = []
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
Hl1: Forall P []
a: A
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P (a :: l2)
H: [] =
dexist a (Forall_hd Hl2)
:: list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl2)
[] = a :: l2
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ (Hl1 : Forall P l1) (l2 : list A) 
  (Hl2 : Forall P l2),
  list_annotate P l1 Hl1 =
  list_annotate P l2 Hl2 â†’ 
  l1 = l2
Hl1: Forall P (a :: l1)
Hl2: Forall P []
H: dexist a (Forall_hd Hl1)
:: list_annotate P l1 (Forall_tl Hl1) = []
a :: l1 = []
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ (Hl1 : Forall P l1) (l2 : list A) 
  (Hl2 : Forall P l2),
  list_annotate P l1 Hl1 =
  list_annotate P l2 Hl2 â†’ 
  l1 = l2
Hl1: Forall P (a :: l1)
a0: A
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P (a0 :: l2)
H: dexist a (Forall_hd Hl1)
:: list_annotate P l1 (Forall_tl Hl1) =
dexist a0 (Forall_hd Hl2)
:: list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl2)
a :: l1 = a0 :: l2

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ (Hl1 : Forall P l1) (l2 : list A) 
  (Hl2 : Forall P l2),
  list_annotate P l1 Hl1 =
  list_annotate P l2 Hl2 â†’ 
  l1 = l2
Hl1: Forall P (a :: l1)
a0: A
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P (a0 :: l2)
H: dexist a (Forall_hd Hl1)
:: list_annotate P l1 (Forall_tl Hl1) =
dexist a0 (Forall_hd Hl2)
:: list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl2)
a :: l1 = a0 :: l2

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ (Hl1 : Forall P l1) (l2 : list A) 
  (Hl2 : Forall P l2),
  list_annotate P l1 Hl1 =
  list_annotate P l2 Hl2 â†’ 
  l1 = l2
Hl1: Forall P (a :: l1)
a0: A
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P (a0 :: l2)
H: dexist a (Forall_hd Hl1)
:: list_annotate P l1 (Forall_tl Hl1) =
dexist a0 (Forall_hd Hl2)
:: list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl2)
H1: a = a0
H2: list_annotate P l1 (Forall_tl Hl1) =
list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl2)
a :: l1 = a0 :: l2

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ (Hl1 : Forall P l1) (l2 : list A) 
  (Hl2 : Forall P l2),
  list_annotate P l1 Hl1 =
  list_annotate P l2 Hl2 â†’ 
  l1 = l2
Hl1: Forall P (a :: l1)
a0: A
l2: list A
Hl2: Forall P (a0 :: l2)
H: dexist a (Forall_hd Hl1)
:: list_annotate P l1 (Forall_tl Hl1) =
dexist a0 (Forall_hd Hl2)
:: list_annotate P l2 (Forall_tl Hl2)
H1: a = a0
H2: l1 = l2
a :: l1 = a0 :: l2

  by subst.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs =
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
:: list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs =
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
:: list_annotate P l (Forall_tl Hs)
 done. Qed.


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P (l1 ++ l2)
list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
list_annotate P l1
  (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
list_annotate P l2
  (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P (l1 ++ l2)
list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
list_annotate P l1
  (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
list_annotate P l2
  (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: âˆ€ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),
  list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
list_annotate P ((a :: l1) ++ l2) Hs =
list_annotate P (a :: l1)
  (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs)) ++
list_annotate P l2
  (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: âˆ€ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),
  list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs)
:: list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) (Forall_tl Hs) =
dexist a
  (Forall_hd
     (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs)))
:: list_annotate P l1
     (Forall_tl
        (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))) ++
   list_annotate P l2
     (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))
 
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: âˆ€ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),
  list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs) =
dexist a
  (Forall_hd
     (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs)))
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)

l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: âˆ€ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),

  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) (Forall_tl Hs) =
list_annotate P l1
  (Forall_tl
     (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))) ++
list_annotate P l2
  (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: âˆ€ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),
  list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
dexist a (Forall_hd Hs) =
dexist a
  (Forall_hd
     (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs)))
 by apply dsig_eq.
  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: âˆ€ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),
  list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) (Forall_tl Hs) =
list_annotate P l1
  (Forall_tl
     (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))) ++
list_annotate P l2
  (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))
 
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
Hs: Forall P ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
IHl1: âˆ€ Hs : Forall P (l1 ++ l2),
  list_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) Hs =
  list_annotate P l1
    (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs)) ++
  list_annotate P l2
    (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) Hs))
list_annotate P l1
  (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) (Forall_tl Hs))) ++
list_annotate P l2
  (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P l1 l2) (Forall_tl Hs))) =
list_annotate P l1
  (Forall_tl
     (proj1 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))) ++
list_annotate P l2
  (proj2 (proj1 (Forall_app P (a :: l1) l2) Hs))
 f_equal; apply list_annotate_pi.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Hs: Forall P l
n: nat
âˆƒ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error (list_annotate P l Hs) n = oa
  âˆ§ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error l n

  âˆ§ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error l n

nth_error (list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs) 0 =
Some (dexist a (Forall_hd Hs))
âˆ§ option_map proj1_sig
    (Some (dexist a (Forall_hd Hs))) =
  nth_error (a :: l) 0

    by rewrite list_annotate_unroll.

  âˆ§ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error [] (S n)

A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
n: nat
IHn: âˆ€ (l : list A) (Hs : Forall P l),
  âˆƒ oa : option (dsig P),
    nth_error (list_annotate P l Hs) n = oa
    âˆ§ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error l n
a: A
l: list A
Hs: Forall P (a :: l)
âˆƒ oa : option (dsig P),
  nth_error (list_annotate P (a :: l) Hs) (S n) = oa
  âˆ§ option_map proj1_sig oa = nth_error (a :: l) (S n)
 rewrite list_annotate_unroll; eauto.
Qed.

Fixpoint nth_error_filter_index
  {A} P `{âˆ€ (x:A), Decision (P x)}
  (l : list A)
  (n : nat)
  :=
  match l with
  | [] => None
  | a :: l =>
    if decide (P a) then
      match n with
      | 0 => Some 0
      | S n => option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n)
      end
    else
      option_map S (nth_error_filter_index P l n)
  end.


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
H: âˆ€ x : A, Decision (P x)
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hle: n1 â‰¤ n2
in1, in2: nat
Hin1: nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
Hin2: nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2
in1 â‰¤ in2

Hin1: nth_error_filter_index P l n1 = Some in1
Hin2: nth_error_filter_index P l n2 = Some in2
in1 â‰¤ in2

        lia.

Forall_filter: âˆ€ (A : Type) (P : A â†’ Prop) 
  (Pdec : âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A), Forall P (filter P l)
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Forall P (filter P l)


Forall_filter: âˆ€ (A : Type) (P : A â†’ Prop) 
  (Pdec : âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A), Forall P (filter P l)
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l: list A
Forall P (filter P l)

  
Forall_filter: âˆ€ (A : Type) (P : A â†’ Prop) 
  (Pdec : âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)) 
  (l : list A), Forall P (filter P l)
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
Forall P
  (if decide (P a)
   then a :: filter P l
   else filter P l)

  destruct (decide (P a)); eauto.
Defined.
Produces the sublist of elements of a list filtered by a decidable predicate each of them paired with the proof that it satisfies the predicate. 
Definition filter_annotate
  {A : Type}
  (P : A -> Prop)
  {Pdec : forall a : A, Decision (P a)}
  (l : list A) : list (dsig P) :=
  list_annotate _ _ (Forall_filter P l).

Definition filter_annotate_length
  {A : Type}
  (P : A -> Prop)
  {Pdec : forall a : A, Decision (P a)}
  (l : list A)
  : length (filter_annotate P l) = length (filter P l) :=
  list_annotate_length _ _ (Forall_filter P l).


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
filter_annotate P (a :: l) =
(let fa := filter_annotate P l in
 match decide (P a) with
 | left pa => dexist a pa :: fa
 | right _ => fa
 end)


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l: list A
filter_annotate P (a :: l) =
(let fa := filter_annotate P l in
 match decide (P a) with
 | left pa => dexist a pa :: fa
 | right _ => fa
 end)

  by cbn; case_decide.
Qed.


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l1, l2: list A
filter_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) =
filter_annotate P l1 ++ filter_annotate P l2


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
l1, l2: list A
filter_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) =
filter_annotate P l1 ++ filter_annotate P l2

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: filter_annotate P (l1 ++ l2) =
filter_annotate P l1 ++ filter_annotate P l2
filter_annotate P ((a :: l1) ++ l2) =
filter_annotate P (a :: l1) ++ filter_annotate P l2

  by simpl; rewrite! filter_annotate_unroll, IHl1; case_decide.
Qed.
Filters a list through a predicate, then transforms each element using a function which depends on the fact that the predicate holds. 
Definition list_filter_map
  {A B : Type}
  (P : A -> Prop)
  {Pdec : forall a, Decision (P a)}
  (f : dsig P -> B)
  (l : list A)
  : list B :=
  map f (filter_annotate P l).


A, B: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
f: dsig P â†’ B
l1, l2: list A
list_filter_map P f (l1 ++ l2) =
list_filter_map P f l1 ++ list_filter_map P f l2


A, B: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
f: dsig P â†’ B
l1, l2: list A
list_filter_map P f (l1 ++ l2) =
list_filter_map P f l1 ++ list_filter_map P f l2

  by unfold list_filter_map; rewrite filter_annotate_app, map_app.
Qed.


A: Type
s: list A
n, i: nat
Hi: i < n
nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i


A: Type
s: list A
n, i: nat
Hi: i < n
nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i

  
A: Type
i: nat
âˆ€ (s : list A) (n : nat),
  i < n
  â†’ nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i

  
A: Type
a: A
s: list A
Hi: 0 < 0
nth_error (list_prefix (a :: s) 0) 0 =
nth_error (a :: s) 0
A: Type
i: nat
IHi: âˆ€ (s : list A) (n : nat),
i < n â†’ nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i
a: A
s: list A
Hi: S i < 0
nth_error (list_prefix (a :: s) 0) (S i) =
nth_error (a :: s) (S i)
A: Type
i: nat
IHi: âˆ€ (s : list A) (n : nat),
i < n â†’ nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i
a: A
s: list A
n: nat
Hi: S i < S n
nth_error (list_prefix (a :: s) (S n)) (S i) =
nth_error (a :: s) (S i)

  
A: Type
a: A
s: list A
Hi: 0 < 0
nth_error (list_prefix (a :: s) 0) 0 =
nth_error (a :: s) 0
 inversion Hi.
  
A: Type

IHi: âˆ€ (s : list A) (n : nat),
i < n â†’ nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i
a: A
s: list A
Hi: S i < 0
nth_error (list_prefix (a :: s) 0) (S i) =
nth_error (a :: s) (S i)
 inversion Hi.
  
A: Type
i: nat
IHi: âˆ€ (s : list A) (n : nat),
i < n â†’ nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i
a: A
s: list A
n: nat

nth_error (list_prefix (a :: s) (S n)) (S i) =
nth_error (a :: s) (S i)
 
A: Type
i: nat
IHi: âˆ€ (s : list A) (n : nat),
i < n â†’ nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i
a: A
s: list A
n: nat
Hi: S i < S n
nth_error (list_prefix s n) i = nth_error s i
 rewrite (IHi s n); [done | lia].
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
S n â‰¤ length l

âˆ€ a : A, nth_error l n = Some a â†’ S n â‰¤ length l

âˆ€ (l : list A) (a : A),
  nth_error l n = Some a â†’ S n â‰¤ length l

  
A: Type

b: A
Hnth: nth_error (a :: l) 0 = Some b
H0: a = b
1 â‰¤ S (length l)

A: Type

_last: A
nth = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last

Hpref: n < S n
â†’ nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
  nth_error l n
Hlast: nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
Some (List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last)
nth = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last

    
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
nth, _last: A
Hnth: Some (List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last) =
Some nth
Hlen: S n â‰¤ length l
Hpref_len: S n = length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hpref: n < S n
â†’ nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
  nth_error l n
Hlast: nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
Some (List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last)
nth = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) _last
 by inversion Hnth.
  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
nth: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some nth
_last: A
Hlen: S n â‰¤ length l
Hpref_len: S n = length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hpref: n < S n
â†’ nth_error (list_prefix l (S n)) n =
  nth_error l n
n < S n
 constructor.
Qed.


A: Type
s: list A
n, i: nat
Hi: n â‰¤ i
nth_error (list_suffix s n) (i - n) = nth_error s i


A: Type
s: list A
n, i: nat
Hi: n â‰¤ i
nth_error (list_suffix s n) (i - n) = nth_error s i

  
A: Type
i: nat
âˆ€ (s : list A) (n : nat),
  n â‰¤ i
  â†’ nth_error (list_suffix s n) (i - n) =
    nth_error s i

  
A: Type
a: A
s: list A
n: nat
Hi: S n â‰¤ 0
nth_error (list_suffix (a :: s) (S n)) (0 - S n) =
nth_error (a :: s) 0
A: Type

nth_error [] (S i)

A: Type

_default: A

List.last l _default

List.last l _default

  i < length l
  â†’ List.last (list_suffix l i) _default =
    List.last l _default

  i < length l
  â†’ List.last (list_suffix l i) _default =
    List.last l _default

Hlt: S i < length (a :: l)

List.last (a :: l) _default

A: Type

a: A
Hlt: S i < S (length l)
Hlt': i < length l
List.last l _default = List.last l a

  
A: Type
i: nat
_default: A
IHi: List.last (list_suffix [] i) _default =
List.last [] _default
a: A
Hlt: S i < S (length [])
Hlt': i < length []
List.last [] _default = List.last [] a
A: Type
i: nat
_default, a0: A
l: list A
IHi: List.last (list_suffix (a0 :: l) i) _default =
List.last (a0 :: l) _default
a: A
Hlt: S i < S (length (a0 :: l))
Hlt': i < length (a0 :: l)
List.last (a0 :: l) _default = List.last (a0 :: l) a

  
A: Type
i: nat
_default: A
IHi: List.last (list_suffix [] i) _default =
List.last [] _default
a: A
Hlt: S i < S (length [])
Hlt': i < length []
List.last [] _default = List.last [] a
 inversion Hlt; lia.
  
A: Type
i: nat
_default, a0: A
l: list A
IHi: List.last (list_suffix (a0 :: l) i) _default =
List.last (a0 :: l) _default
a: A
Hlt: S i < S (length (a0 :: l))
Hlt': i < length (a0 :: l)
List.last (a0 :: l) _default = List.last (a0 :: l) a
 by rewrite unroll_last, unroll_last.
Qed.

    _default

i = length l
 by inversion Hlast.
Qed.

H23: n2 â‰¤ n3

list_segment l n1 n3

list_segment l n1 n3

A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 â‰¤ n2
H23: n2 â‰¤ n3
Hle: n1 â‰¤ n3

list_prefix l n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 â‰¤ n2
H23: n2 â‰¤ n3
Hle: n1 â‰¤ n3
Hl1: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3 =
list_prefix l n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3
Hl2: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 =
list_prefix l n2
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 â‰¤ n2
H23: n2 â‰¤ n3
Hle: n1 â‰¤ n3
Hl1: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3 =
list_prefix l n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3
Hl2: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 =
list_prefix l n2
Hl3: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 â‰¤ n2
H23: n2 â‰¤ n3
Hle: n1 â‰¤ n3
Hl1: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3 =
list_prefix l n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3
Hl2: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n2
Hl3: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 â‰¤ n2
H23: n2 â‰¤ n3
Hle: n1 â‰¤ n3
Hl1: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3 =
(list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1) ++
list_segment l n2 n3
Hl2: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n2
Hl3: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2, n3: nat
H12: n1 â‰¤ n2
H23: n2 â‰¤ n3
Hle: n1 â‰¤ n3
Hl1: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_segment l n1 n3 =
list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 ++ list_segment l n2 n3
Hl2: list_prefix l n1 ++ list_suffix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n2
Hl3: list_prefix (list_prefix l n2) n1 = list_prefix l n1
list_segment l n1 n2 ++ list_segment l n2 n3 =
list_segment l n1 n3

  by apply app_inv_head in Hl1.
Qed.

Hle: S n â‰¤ length l

Hlast1: List.last
  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a =

List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A

a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n â‰¤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))

  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a = a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n â‰¤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hlast1: List.last
  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a = a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
length (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) =
length (list_prefix l (S n)) - n
â†’ list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n â‰¤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hlast1: List.last
  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a = a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
length (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) = S n - n
â†’ list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n â‰¤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hlast1: List.last
  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a = a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
Hlength: length (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) =
S n - n
list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n â‰¤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hlast1: List.last
  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a = a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
Hlength: length (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) =
S n - n
Hs: S n - n = 1
list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n â‰¤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
Hlast1: List.last
  (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) a = a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
Hlength: length (list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n) =
1
Hs: S n - n = 1
list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n = [a]

  
A: Type
l: list A
n: nat
a: A
Hnth: nth_error l n = Some a
Hle: S n â‰¤ length l
Hlt: n < length (list_prefix l (S n))
x: list A
Heqx: x = list_suffix (list_prefix l (S n)) n
Hlast1: List.last x a = a
Hlast2: a = List.last (list_prefix l (S n)) a
Hlength: length x = 1
Hs: S n - n = 1
x = [a]

  
A: Type
a: A
x: list A
Hlast1: List.last x a = a
Hlength: length x = 1
x = [a]

  
A: Type
a, a0: A
x: list A
Hlast1: List.last (a0 :: x) a = a
Hlength: length (a0 :: x) = 1
H0: length x = 0
a0 :: x = [a]

  
A: Type
a, a0: A
Hlast1: List.last [a0] a = a
Hlength: length [a0] = 1
H0: length [] = 0
[a0] = [a]

  by simpl in Hlast1; subst.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
l: list A
n: nat
nth_error (map f l) n = option_map f (nth_error l n)


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
l: list A
n: nat
nth_error (map f l) n = option_map f (nth_error l n)

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ B
l: list A
âˆ€ n : nat,
  nth_error (map f l) n = option_map f (nth_error l n)
 induction l; intros [| n]; firstorder.
Qed.


index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
P: index â†’ Prop
(âˆƒ n : index, P n) â†” Exists P (enum index)


index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
P: index â†’ Prop
(âˆƒ n : index, P n) â†” Exists P (enum index)

  
index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
P: index â†’ Prop
(âˆƒ n : index, P n) â†’ âˆƒ x : index, x âˆˆ enum index âˆ§ P x
index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
P: index â†’ Prop
(âˆƒ x : index, x âˆˆ enum index âˆ§ P x) â†’ âˆƒ n : index, P n

  
index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
P: index â†’ Prop
(âˆƒ n : index, P n) â†’ âˆƒ x : index, x âˆˆ enum index âˆ§ P x
 intros [n Hn]; eexists; split; [apply elem_of_enum | done].
  
index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
H: finite.Finite index
P: index â†’ Prop
(âˆƒ x : index, x âˆˆ enum index âˆ§ P x) â†’ âˆƒ n : index, P n
 by intros (n & _ & Hn); eexists.
Qed.

Definition map_option
  {A B : Type}
  (f : A -> option B)
  : list A -> list B
  :=
  fold_right
    (fun x lb =>
      match f x with
      | None => lb
      | Some b => b :: lb
      end
    )
    [].


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
l1, l2: list A
map_option f (l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
l1, l2: list A
map_option f (l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: map_option f (l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
map_option f ((a :: l1) ++ l2) =
map_option f (a :: l1) ++ map_option f l2

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l1, l2: list A
IHl1: map_option f (l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
match f a with
| Some b => b :: map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
| None => map_option f l1 ++ map_option f l2
end =
match f a with
| Some b => b :: map_option f l1
| None => map_option f l1
end ++ map_option f l2

  by destruct (f a).
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
l: list A
l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
  l = l1 ++ l2
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
l: list A
l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
  l = l1 ++ l2
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
l: list A
âˆ€ l1' l2' : list B,
  map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
  â†’ âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
      l = l1 ++ l2
      âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: map_option f [] = l1' ++ l2'
âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
  [] = l1 ++ l2
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ l1' l2' : list B,
  map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
  â†’ âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
      l = l1 ++ l2
      âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1'
        âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'
l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: map_option f (a :: l) = l1' ++ l2'
âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

f: A â†’ option B
l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: l1' ++ l2' = map_option f []
âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
  [] = l1 ++ l2
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

l1', l2': list B
Hl1': l1' = []
Hl2': l2' = []
âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
  [] = l1 ++ l2
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

    
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
  [] = l1 ++ l2
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = [] âˆ§ map_option f l2 = []
 
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
[] = [] ++ []
âˆ§ map_option f [] = [] âˆ§ map_option f [] = []
 repeat split.
  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ l1' l2' : list B,

â†’ âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'
l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: map_option f (a :: l) = l1' ++ l2'
âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ l1' l2' : list B,

â†’ âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'
l1', l2': list B
Happ_rev: match f a with
| Some b => b :: map_option f l
| None => map_option f l
end = l1' ++ l2'
âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

l = l1 ++ l2 âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

Happ_rev: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

  â†’ âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
      l = l1 ++ l2
      âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1'
        âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

Happ_rev: b :: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,

  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
Hfa: f a = None
_l1, l2: list A
Happ_rev: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
âˆƒ l1 l3 : list A,
  a :: _l1 ++ l2 = l1 ++ l3
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = map_option f _l1
    âˆ§ map_option f l3 = map_option f l2

      
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
Hfa: f a = None
_l1, l2: list A
Happ_rev: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
a :: _l1 ++ l2 = (a :: _l1) ++ l2
âˆ§ map_option f (a :: _l1) = map_option f _l1
  âˆ§ map_option f l2 = map_option f l2
 by cbn; rewrite Hfa.

A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l: list A

Happ_rev: b :: map_option f l = [_b] ++ l1' ++ l2'
H0: b = _b
H1: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = _b :: l1'
    âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

H1: map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = b :: l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = b :: l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

a: A
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
_l1, l2: list A
H1: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
[b] ++ map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
âˆƒ l1 l3 : list A,
  a :: _l1 ++ l2 = l1 ++ l3
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = b :: map_option f _l1
    âˆ§ map_option f l3 = map_option f l2

        
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
_l1, l2: list A
H1: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
Happ_rev: b :: map_option f (_l1 ++ l2) =
[b] ++ map_option f _l1 ++ map_option f l2
a :: _l1 ++ l2 = (a :: _l1) ++ l2
âˆ§ map_option f (a :: _l1) = b :: map_option f _l1
  âˆ§ map_option f l2 = map_option f l2
 by cbn; rewrite Hfa.

f: A â†’ option B

Hfa: f a = Some b

âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = [] âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'

  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = [] âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'
 
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
â†’ âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
  a :: l = l1 ++ l2
  âˆ§ map_option f l1 = []
    âˆ§ map_option f l2 = b :: map_option f l

        
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ l1' l2' : list B,
map_option f l = l1' ++ l2'
â†’ âˆƒ l1 l2 : list A,
l = l1 ++ l2 âˆ§ map_option f l1 = l1' âˆ§ map_option f l2 = l2'
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
a :: l = [] ++ a :: l
âˆ§ map_option f [] = []
  âˆ§ map_option f (a :: l) = b :: map_option f l
 by cbn; rewrite Hfa.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l
length (map_option f l) = length l


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l
length (map_option f l) = length l

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) (a :: l)
IHl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l â†’ length (map_option f l) = length l
length (map_option f (a :: l)) = length (a :: l)

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) (a :: l)
IHl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l â†’ length (map_option f l) = length l
H1: f a â‰  None
H2: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l
length (map_option f (a :: l)) = length (a :: l)

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) (a :: l)
H1: f a â‰  None
H2: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l
IHl: length (map_option f l) = length l
length
  match f a with
  | Some b => b :: map_option f l
  | None => map_option f l
  end = S (length l)

  destruct (f a); cbn; congruence.
Qed.


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l
n:= length l: nat
i: nat
Hi: i < n
dummya: A
dummyb: B
Some (nth i (map_option f l) dummyb) =
f (nth i l dummya)


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l
n:= length l: nat
i: nat
Hi: i < n
dummya: A
dummyb: B
Some (nth i (map_option f l) dummyb) =
f (nth i l dummya)

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l
n:= length l: nat
dummya: A
dummyb: B
âˆ€ i : nat,
  i < n
  â†’ Some (nth i (map_option f l) dummyb) =
    f (nth i l dummya)

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) (a :: l)
n:= S (length l): nat
dummya: A
dummyb: B
IHl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l
â†’ âˆ€ i : nat,
    i < length l
    â†’ Some (nth i (map_option f l) dummyb) =
      f (nth i l dummya)
i: nat
Hi: i < n
Some
  (nth i
     match f a with
     | Some b => b :: map_option f l
     | None => map_option f l
     end dummyb) =
f match i with
  | 0 => a
  | S m => nth m l dummya
  end

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) (a :: l)
n:= S (length l): nat
dummya: A
dummyb: B
IHl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l
â†’ âˆ€ i : nat,
    i < length l
    â†’ Some (nth i (map_option f l) dummyb) =
      f (nth i l dummya)
i: nat
Hi: i < n
H1: f a â‰  None
H2: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l
Some
  (nth i
     match f a with
     | Some b => b :: map_option f l
     | None => map_option f l
     end dummyb) =
f match i with
  | 0 => a
  | S m => nth m l dummya
  end

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) (a :: l)
n:= S (length l): nat
dummya: A
dummyb: B
IHl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l
â†’ âˆ€ i : nat,
    i < length l
    â†’ Some (nth i (map_option f l) dummyb) =
      f (nth i l dummya)
i: nat
Hi: i < n
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
H1: Some b â‰  None
H2: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l
Some (nth i (b :: map_option f l) dummyb) =
f match i with
  | 0 => a
  | S m => nth m l dummya
  end

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) (a :: l)
n:= S (length l): nat
dummya: A
dummyb: B
i: nat
Hi: S i < n
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
H1: Some b â‰  None
H2: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l
H: âˆ€ i : nat,
  i < length l
  â†’ Some (nth i (map_option f l) dummyb) =
    f (nth i l dummya)
Some (nth (S i) (b :: map_option f l) dummyb) =
f (nth i l dummya)
 
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
a: A
l: list A
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) (a :: l)
n:= S (length l): nat
dummya: A
dummyb: B
i: nat
Hi: S i < n
b: B
Hfa: f a = Some b
H1: Some b â‰  None
H2: Forall (Î» a : A, f a â‰  None) l
H: âˆ€ i : nat,
  i < length l
  â†’ Some (nth i (map_option f l) dummyb) =
    f (nth i l dummya)
i < length l
 lia.
Qed.
map_option can be expressed as a list_filter_map. 
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
l: list A
map_option f l =
list_filter_map (is_Some âˆ˜ f)
  (Î» x : dsig (is_Some âˆ˜ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l


A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
l: list A
map_option f l =
list_filter_map (is_Some âˆ˜ f)
  (Î» x : dsig (is_Some âˆ˜ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
x: A
l: list A
IHl: map_option f l =
list_filter_map (is_Some âˆ˜ f)
(Î» x : dsig (is_Some âˆ˜ f), is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l
map_option f (l ++ [x]) =
list_filter_map (is_Some âˆ˜ f)
  (Î» x : dsig (is_Some âˆ˜ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) (l ++ [x])

  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
x: A
l: list A
list_filter_map (is_Some âˆ˜ f)
  (Î» x : dsig (is_Some âˆ˜ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l ++
match f x with
| Some b => [b]
| None => []
end =
list_filter_map (is_Some âˆ˜ f)
  (Î» x : dsig (is_Some âˆ˜ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l ++
map
  (Î» x : dsig (is_Some âˆ˜ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x))
  (list_annotate (is_Some âˆ˜ f)
     (if decide (is_Some (f x)) then [x] else [])
     match
       decide (is_Some (f x)) as s
       return
         (Forall (is_Some âˆ˜ f) (if s then [x] else []))
     with
     | left a =>
         List.Forall_cons (is_Some âˆ˜ f) x [] a
           (List.Forall_nil (is_Some âˆ˜ f))
     | right _ => List.Forall_nil (is_Some âˆ˜ f)
     end)

     (List.Forall_cons (is_Some âˆ˜ f) x [] i
        (List.Forall_nil (is_Some âˆ˜ f))))

A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
x: A
l: list A
i: is_Some (f x)
(fix app (l m : list B) {struct l} : list B :=
   match l with
   | [] => m
   | a :: l1 => a :: app l1 m
   end)
  ((fix map
      (l : list
             {x : A
             | if
                if
                 match
                   f x as mx
                   return
                     ({âˆƒ x0 : B, mx = Some x0} +
                      {(âˆƒ x0 : B, mx = Some x0)
                       â†’ False})
                 with
                 | Some x0 =>
                     left
                       (ex_intro
                          (Î» x1 : B, Some x0 = Some x1)
                          x0 eq_refl)
                 | None => right is_Some_None
                 end
                then true
                else false
               then True
               else False}) : list B :=
      match l with
      | [] => []
      | a :: t =>
          match
            f (let (a0, _) := a in a0) as mx
            return ((âˆƒ x : B, mx = Some x) â†’ B)
          with
          | Some x =>
              Î» _ : âˆƒ x0 : B, Some x = Some x0, x
          | None =>
              Î» x : âˆƒ x : B, None = Some x,
                match is_Some_None x return B with
                end
          end
            (bool_decide_unpack
               (âˆƒ x : B,
                  f (let (a0, _) := a in a0) = Some x)
               (let
                  (a0, b) as e
                   return
                     (if
                       if
                        match
                          f ... as mx return (...)
                        with
                        | Some x =>
                            left
                              (ex_intro ... x eq_refl)
                        | None => right is_Some_None
                        end
                       then true
                       else false
                      then True
                      else False) := a in
                b)) :: map t
      end)
     ((fix list_annotate
         (A : Type) (P : A â†’ Prop)
         (Pdec : âˆ€ a : A, {P a} + {P a â†’ False})
         (l : list A) (Hs : Forall P l) {struct l} :
           list
             {x : A
             | if if Pdec x then true else false
               then True
               else False} :=
         match
           l as l0
           return
             (Forall P l0
              â†’ list
                  {x : A
                  | if if Pdec x then true else false
                    then True
                    else False})
         with
         | [] => Î» _ : Forall P [], []
         | a :: l0 =>
             Î» Hs0 : Forall P (a :: l0),
               a
               â†¾ bool_decide_pack (P a)
                   (match
                      Hs0 in (Forall _ l1)
                      return (l1 = a :: l0 â†’ P a)
                    with
                    | List.Forall_nil _ =>
                        Î» H : [] = a :: l0,
                          match
                            match ... ... with
                            | ... => I
                            end return (P a)
                          with
                          end
                    | List.Forall_cons _ x l1 x0 x1 =>
                        Î» H1 : x :: l1 = a :: l0,
                          match
                            match ... with
                            | ... eq_refl
                            end in (_ = y)
                            return (... â†’ ...)
                          with
                          | eq_refl =>
                              Î» H0 : l1 = l0,
                                match ... ... with
                                | ... => ..., H2
                                end
                          end
                            match
                              H1 in (_ = y)
                              return (l1 = ...)
                            with
                            | eq_refl => eq_refl
                            end x0 x1
                    end eq_refl)
               :: list_annotate A P Pdec l0
                    (match
                       Hs0 in (Forall _ l1)
                       return
                         (l1 = a :: l0 â†’ Forall P l0)
                     with
                     | List.Forall_nil _ =>
                         Î» H : [] = a :: l0,
                           match
                             match
                               H in ... return ...
                             with
                             | eq_refl => I
                             end return (Forall P l0)
                           with
                           end
                     | List.Forall_cons _ x l1 x0 x1 =>
                         Î» H1 : x :: l1 = a :: l0,
                           match
                             match ... ... with
                             | ... => eq_refl
                             end in (_ = y)
                             return
                               (l1 = l0 â†’ ... â†’ ...)
                           with
                           | eq_refl =>
                               Î» H0 : l1 = l0,
                                 match
                                   ... in ...
                                   return ...
                                 with
                                 | eq_refl =>
                                     Î» ... ..., H3
                                 end
                           end
                             match
                               H1 in (_ = y)
                               return
                                 (l1 = ...
                                       ...
                                       ...
                                       end)
                             with
                             | eq_refl => eq_refl
                             end x0 x1
                     end eq_refl)
         end Hs) A (Î» x : A, âˆƒ x0 : B, f x = Some x0)
        (Î» x : A,
           match
             f x as mx
             return
               ({âˆƒ x0 : B, mx = Some x0} +
                {(âˆƒ x0 : B, mx = Some x0) â†’ False})

                 (ex_intro
                    (Î» x1 : B, Some x0 = Some x1) x0
                    eq_refl)
           | None => right is_Some_None
           end)
        ((fix go
            (P : A â†’ Prop)
            (H : âˆ€ x : A, {P x} + {P x â†’ False})
            (l : list A) {struct l} : list A :=
            match l with
            | [] => []
            | x :: l0 =>
                if H x
                then x :: go P H l0
                else go P H l0
            end) (Î» x : A, âˆƒ x0 : B, f x = Some x0)
           (Î» x : A,
              match
                f x as mx
                return
                  ({âˆƒ x0 : B, mx = Some x0} +
                   {(âˆƒ x0 : B, mx = Some x0) â†’ False})
              with
              | Some x0 =>
                  left
                    (ex_intro
                       (Î» x1 : B, Some x0 = Some x1)
                       x0 eq_refl)
              | None => right is_Some_None
              end) l)
        ((fix Forall_filter
            (A : Type) (P : A â†’ Prop)
            (Pdec : âˆ€ a : A, {P a} + {P a â†’ False})
            (l : list A) {struct l} :
              Forall P
                ((fix go
                    (P0 : A â†’ Prop)
                    (H : âˆ€ x : A,
                           {P0 x} + {P0 x â†’ False})
                    (l0 : list A) {struct l0} :
                      list A :=
                    match l0 with
                    | [] => []
                    | x :: l1 =>
                        if H x
                        then x :: go P0 H l1
                        else go P0 H l1
                    end) P Pdec l) :=
            match
              l as l0
              return
                (Forall P
                   ((fix go
                       (P0 : A â†’ Prop)
                       (H : âˆ€ x : A,
                              {P0 x} + {P0 x â†’ False})
                       (l1 : list A) {struct l1} :
                         list A :=
                       match l1 with
                       | [] => []
                       | x :: l2 =>
                           if H x
                           then x :: go P0 H l2
                           else go P0 H l2
                       end) P Pdec l0))
            with
            | [] => List.Forall_nil P
            | a :: l0 =>
                match
                  Pdec a as s
                  return
                    (Forall P
                       (if s
                        then
                         a
                         :: (fix go
                               ... ... ... {struct l1} :
                                 list A :=
                               match ... with
                               | ... []
                               | ... ...
                               end) P Pdec l0
                        else
                         (fix go
                            (P0 : ...) (H : ...)
                            (l1 : ...) {struct l1} :
                              list A :=
                            match ... with
                            | ... => []
                            | ... => ... ... ...
                            end) P Pdec l0))
                with
                | left a0 =>
                    List.Forall_cons P a
                      ((fix go
                          (P0 : A â†’ Prop)
                          (H : âˆ€ x : A,
                                 {P0 x} +
                                 {P0 x â†’ False})
                          (l1 : list A) {struct l1} :
                            list A :=
                          match l1 with
                          | [] => []
                          | x :: l2 =>
                              if H x
                              then x :: go P0 H l2
                              else go P0 H l2
                          end) P Pdec l0) a0
                      (Forall_filter A P Pdec l0)
                | right _ => Forall_filter A P Pdec l0
                end
            end) A (Î» x : A, âˆƒ x0 : B, f x = Some x0)
           (Î» x : A,
              match
                f x as mx
                return
                  ({âˆƒ x0 : B, mx = Some x0} +
                   {(âˆƒ x0 : B, mx = Some x0) â†’ False})
              with
              | Some x0 =>
                  left
                    (ex_intro
                       (Î» x1 : B, Some x0 = Some x1)
                       x0 eq_refl)
              | None => right is_Some_None
              end) l)))
  match f x with
  | Some b => [b]
  | None => []
  end =
(fix app (l m : list B) {struct l} : list B :=
   match l with
   | [] => m
   | a :: l1 => a :: app l1 m
   end)
  ((fix map
      (l : list
             {x : A
             | if
                if
                 match
                   f x as mx
                   return
                     ({âˆƒ x0 : B, mx = Some x0} +
                      {(âˆƒ x0 : B, mx = Some x0)
                       â†’ False})

                       (ex_intro
                          (Î» x1 : B, Some x0 = Some x1)
                          x0 eq_refl)
                 | None => right is_Some_None
                 end
                then true
                else false
               then True
               else False}) : list B :=
      match l with
      | [] => []
      | a :: t =>
          match
            f (let (a0, _) := a in a0) as mx
            return ((âˆƒ x : B, mx = Some x) â†’ B)
          with
          | Some x =>
              Î» _ : âˆƒ x0 : B, Some x = Some x0, x

              Î» x : âˆƒ x : B, None = Some x,

                end

               (âˆƒ x : B,

                   (match

                    | List.Forall_nil _ =>
                        Î» H : [] = a :: l0,

                          end

                        Î» H1 : x :: l1 = a :: l0,
