        ((fix go
            (P : A â†’ Prop)
            (H : âˆ€ x : A, {P x} + {P x â†’ False})
            (l : list A) {struct l} : list A :=
            match l with
            | [] => []
            | x :: l0 =>
                if H x
                then x :: go P H l0
                else go P H l0
            end) (Î» x : A, âˆƒ x0 : B, f x = Some x0)
           (Î» x : A,
              match
                f x as mx
                return
                  ({âˆƒ x0 : B, mx = Some x0} +
                   {(âˆƒ x0 : B, mx = Some x0) â†’ False})
              with
              | Some x0 =>
                  left
                    (ex_intro
                       (Î» x1 : B, Some x0 = Some x1)
                       x0 eq_refl)
              | None => right is_Some_None
              end) l)
        ((fix Forall_filter
            (A : Type) (P : A â†’ Prop)
            (Pdec : âˆ€ a : A, {P a} + {P a â†’ False})
            (l : list A) {struct l} :
              Forall P
                ((fix go
                    (P0 : A â†’ Prop)
                    (H : âˆ€ x : A,
                           {P0 x} + {P0 x â†’ False})
                    (l0 : list A) {struct l0} :
                      list A :=
                    match l0 with
                    | [] => []
                    | x :: l1 =>
                        if H x
                        then x :: go P0 H l1
                        else go P0 H l1
                    end) P Pdec l) :=
            match
              l as l0
              return
                (Forall P
                   ((fix go
                       (P0 : A â†’ Prop)
                       (H : âˆ€ x : A,
                              {P0 x} + {P0 x â†’ False})
                       (l1 : list A) {struct l1} :
                         list A :=
                       match l1 with
                       | [] => []
                       | x :: l2 =>
                           if H x
                           then x :: go P0 H l2
                           else go P0 H l2
                       end) P Pdec l0))
            with
            | [] => List.Forall_nil P
            | a :: l0 =>
                match
                  Pdec a as s
                  return
                    (Forall P
                       (if s
                        then
                         a
                         :: (fix go
                               ... ... ... {struct l1} :
                                 list A :=
                               match ... with
                               | ... []
                               | ... ...
                               end) P Pdec l0
                        else
                         (fix go
                            (P0 : ...) (H : ...)
                            (l1 : ...) {struct l1} :
                              list A :=
                            match ... with
                            | ... => []
                            | ... => ... ... ...
                            end) P Pdec l0))
                with
                | left a0 =>
                    List.Forall_cons P a
                      ((fix go
                          (P0 : A â†’ Prop)
                          (H : âˆ€ x : A,
                                 {P0 x} +
                                 {P0 x â†’ False})
                          (l1 : list A) {struct l1} :
                            list A :=
                          match l1 with
                          | [] => []
                          | x :: l2 =>
                              if H x
                              then x :: go P0 H l2
                              else go P0 H l2
                          end) P Pdec l0) a0
                      (Forall_filter A P Pdec l0)
                | right _ => Forall_filter A P Pdec l0
                end
            end) A (Î» x : A, âˆƒ x0 : B, f x = Some x0)
           (Î» x : A,
              match
                f x as mx
                return
                  ({âˆƒ x0 : B, mx = Some x0} +
                   {(âˆƒ x0 : B, mx = Some x0) â†’ False})
              with
              | Some x0 =>
                  left
                    (ex_intro
                       (Î» x1 : B, Some x0 = Some x1)
                       x0 eq_refl)
              | None => right is_Some_None
              end) l)))
  [match
     f x as mx return ((âˆƒ x : B, mx = Some x) â†’ B)
   with
   | Some x => Î» _ : âˆƒ x0 : B, Some x = Some x0, x
   | None =>
       Î» x : âˆƒ x : B, None = Some x,
         match is_Some_None x return B with
         end
   end
     (bool_decide_unpack (âˆƒ x0 : B, f x = Some x0)
        (bool_decide_pack (âˆƒ x0 : B, f x = Some x0) i))]
 by destruct i as [? ->].
  
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
x: A
l: list A
n: Â¬ is_Some (f x)
list_filter_map (is_Some âˆ˜ f)
  (Î» x : dsig (is_Some âˆ˜ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l ++
match f x with
| Some b => [b]
| None => []
end =
list_filter_map (is_Some âˆ˜ f)
  (Î» x : dsig (is_Some âˆ˜ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l ++
map
  (Î» x : dsig (is_Some âˆ˜ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x))
  (list_annotate (is_Some âˆ˜ f) []
     (List.Forall_nil (is_Some âˆ˜ f)))
 
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
x: A
l: list A
n: Â¬ is_Some (f x)
list_filter_map (is_Some âˆ˜ f)
  (Î» x : dsig (is_Some âˆ˜ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l ++
match f x with
| Some b => [b]
| None => []
end =
list_filter_map (is_Some âˆ˜ f)
  (Î» x : dsig (is_Some âˆ˜ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l ++ []
 
A, B: Type
f: A â†’ option B
x: A
l: list A
b: B
n: Â¬ is_Some (Some b)
list_filter_map (is_Some âˆ˜ f)
  (Î» x : dsig (is_Some âˆ˜ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l ++ [b] =
list_filter_map (is_Some âˆ˜ f)
  (Î» x : dsig (is_Some âˆ˜ f),
     is_Some_proj (proj2_dsig x)) l ++ []
 by elim n.
Qed.
Unpack list of option A into list of A 
Definition cat_option {A : Type} : list (option A) -> list A :=
  @map_option (option A) A id.


cat_option [Some 1; Some 5; None; Some 6; None] =
[1; 5; 6]


cat_option [Some 1; Some 5; None; Some 6; None] =
[1; 5; 6]
 itauto. Qed.


A: Type
l: list (option A)
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : option A, a â‰  None) l
length (cat_option l) = length l


A: Type
l: list (option A)
Hfl: Forall (Î» a : option A, a â‰  None) l
length (cat_option l) = length l

  apply map_option_length; itauto.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list (option A)
length (cat_option l) â‰¤ length l


A: Type
l: list (option A)
length (cat_option l) â‰¤ length l

  
A: Type
length (cat_option []) â‰¤ length []
A: Type
a: option A
l: list (option A)
IHl: length (cat_option l) â‰¤ length l
length (cat_option (a :: l)) â‰¤ length (a :: l)

  
A: Type
length (cat_option []) â‰¤ length []
 itauto.
  
A: Type
a: option A
l: list (option A)
IHl: length (cat_option l) â‰¤ length l
length (cat_option (a :: l)) â‰¤ length (a :: l)
 
A: Type
a: option A
l: list (option A)
IHl: length (cat_option l) â‰¤ length l
length
  match a with
  | Some b => b :: cat_option l
  | None => cat_option l
  end â‰¤ S (length l)

    destruct (id a) eqn : eq_id; simpl in *; subst a; simpl; lia.
Qed.


A: Type
l1, l2: list (option A)
cat_option (l1 ++ l2) = cat_option l1 ++ cat_option l2


A: Type
l1, l2: list (option A)
cat_option (l1 ++ l2) = cat_option l1 ++ cat_option l2

  
A: Type
l2: list (option A)
cat_option ([] ++ l2) = cat_option [] ++ cat_option l2
A: Type
a: option A
l1, l2: list (option A)
IHl1: cat_option (l1 ++ l2) =
cat_option l1 ++ cat_option l2
cat_option ((a :: l1) ++ l2) =
cat_option (a :: l1) ++ cat_option l2

  
A: Type
l2: list (option A)
cat_option ([] ++ l2) = cat_option [] ++ cat_option l2
 
A: Type
l2: list (option A)
cat_option l2 = cat_option l2
 itauto.
  
A: Type
a: option A
l1, l2: list (option A)
IHl1: cat_option (l1 ++ l2) =
cat_option l1 ++ cat_option l2
cat_option ((a :: l1) ++ l2) =
cat_option (a :: l1) ++ cat_option l2
 by destruct a; cbn in *; rewrite IHl1.
Qed.


A: Type

n:= length l: nat
i: nat
Hi: i < n
dummya: A
Some (nth i (cat_option l) dummya) =
nth i l (Some dummya)

 â†’ âˆ€ (n := length l) (i : nat),
     i < n
     â†’ âˆ€ (dummya : option A) (dummyb : A),
         Some (nth i (map_option id l) dummyb) =
         id (nth i l dummya))
â†’ Some (nth i (cat_option l) dummya) =
  nth i l (Some dummya)

A: Type
l1, l2: list A
Hnth: âˆ€ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n
l1 = l2


A: Type

Hnth: âˆ€ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n
l1 = l2

  
A: Type

âˆ€ l2 : list A,
  (âˆ€ n : nat, nth_error l1 n = nth_error l2 n)
  â†’ l1 = l2

  
A: Type

l2: list A

[] = a2 :: l2

a :: l1 = []

A: Type
l: list A
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, {P a} + {Â¬ P a}
Hsomething: Exists P l
âˆƒ (prefix suffix : list A) (first : A),
  P first
  âˆ§ l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
    âˆ§ Â¬ Exists P prefix

A: Type
a: A
l: list A
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, {P a} + {Â¬ P a}
Hsomething: Exists P (a :: l)
prefix, suffix: list A
first: A
Hfirst: P first
Heq: l = prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix
Hprefix: Â¬ Exists P prefix
n: Â¬ P a
Hl: Exists P l
P first
âˆ§ a :: l = (a :: prefix) ++ [first] ++ suffix
  âˆ§ Â¬ Exists P (a :: prefix)
 
A: Type
a: A
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, {P a} + {Â¬ P a}
prefix, suffix: list A
first: A
Hsomething: Exists P
  (a :: prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix)
Hfirst: P first
Hprefix: Â¬ Exists P prefix
n: Â¬ P a
Hl: Exists P (prefix ++ [first] ++ suffix)
Â¬ Exists P (a :: prefix)

      by inversion 1; subst.
Qed.


A: Type
l: list A
a, b: A
Hin: In a (b :: l)
Hneq: b â‰  a
In a l


A: Type
l: list A
a, b: A
Hin: In a (b :: l)
Hneq: b â‰  a
In a l

  by destruct Hin.
Qed.

Fixpoint one_element_decompositions
  {A : Type}
  (l : list A)
  : list (list A * A * list A)
  :=
  match l with
  | [] => []
  | a :: l' =>
    ([], a, l')
    :: map
      (fun t => match t with (l1, b, l2) => (a :: l1, b, l2) end)
      (one_element_decompositions l')
  end.


A: Type
l, pre, suf: list A
x: A
(pre, x, suf) âˆˆ one_element_decompositions l
â†” pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l


A: Type
l, pre, suf: list A
x: A
(pre, x, suf) âˆˆ one_element_decompositions l
â†” pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l

  
A: Type
l, pre: list A
x: A
âˆ€ suf : list A,
  (pre, x, suf) âˆˆ one_element_decompositions l
  â†” pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l
 
A: Type
l, pre: list A
âˆ€ (x : A) (suf : list A),
  (pre, x, suf) âˆˆ one_element_decompositions l
  â†” pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l
 
A: Type
l: list A
âˆ€ (pre : list A) (x : A) (suf : list A),
  (pre, x, suf) âˆˆ one_element_decompositions l
  â†” pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l

pre ++ x :: suf = []

(pre, x, suf) âˆˆ []

A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ (pre : list A) (x : A) (suf : list A),

a0: A

suf: list A
H: a0 :: pre ++ x :: suf = a :: l
H1: a0 = a
H2: pre ++ x :: suf = l
âˆƒ y : list A * A * list A,
  (a :: pre, x, suf) =
  (let (y0, l2) := y in
   let (l1, b) := y0 in (a :: l1, b, l2))
  âˆ§ y âˆˆ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)
 
A: Type
a: A
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
H: a :: pre ++ x :: suf = a :: pre ++ x :: suf
IHl: âˆ€ (pre0 : list A) (x0 : A) (suf0 : list A),
(pre0, x0, suf0) âˆˆ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)
â†” pre0 ++ [x0] ++ suf0 = pre ++ x :: suf
âˆƒ y : list A * A * list A,
  (a :: pre, x, suf) =
  (let (y0, l2) := y in
   let (l1, b) := y0 in (a :: l1, b, l2))
  âˆ§ y âˆˆ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)
 
A: Type
a: A
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
IHl: âˆ€ (pre0 : list A) (x0 : A) (suf0 : list A),
(pre0, x0, suf0) âˆˆ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)
â†” pre0 ++ [x0] ++ suf0 = pre ++ x :: suf
âˆƒ y : list A * A * list A,
  (a :: pre, x, suf) =
  (let (y0, l2) := y in
   let (l1, b) := y0 in (a :: l1, b, l2))
  âˆ§ y âˆˆ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)

      
A: Type
a: A
pre: list A
x: A
suf: list A
IHl: âˆ€ (pre0 : list A) (x0 : A) (suf0 : list A),
(pre0, x0, suf0) âˆˆ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)
â†” pre0 ++ [x0] ++ suf0 = pre ++ x :: suf
(a :: pre, x, suf) = (a :: pre, x, suf)
âˆ§ (pre, x, suf)
  âˆˆ one_element_decompositions (pre ++ x :: suf)

      by rewrite IHl.
Qed.


A: Type
l, pre, suf: list A
x: A
In (pre, x, suf) (one_element_decompositions l)
â†” pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l


A: Type
l, pre, suf: list A
x: A
In (pre, x, suf) (one_element_decompositions l)
â†” pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l

  
A: Type
l, pre, suf: list A
x: A
(pre, x, suf) âˆˆ one_element_decompositions l
â†” pre ++ [x] ++ suf = l
 apply elem_of_one_element_decompositions.
Qed.

Definition two_element_decompositions
  {A : Type}
  (l : list A)
  : list (list A * A * list A * A * list A)
  :=
  flat_map
    (fun t =>
      match t with
        (l1, e1, l2) =>
        map
          (fun t => match t with (l2',e2, l3) => (l1, e1, l2', e2, l3) end)
          (one_element_decompositions l2)
      end
    )
    (one_element_decompositions l).


A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
In (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
  (two_element_decompositions l)
â†” pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l


A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
In (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
  (two_element_decompositions l)
â†” pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l

  
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
In (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
  (flat_map
     (Î» t : list A * A * list A,
        let (y, l2) := t in
        let (l1, e1) := y in
        map
          (Î» t0 : list A * A * list A,
             let (y0, l3) := t0 in
             let (l2', e2) := y0 in
             (l1, e1, l2', e2, l3))
          (one_element_decompositions l2))
     (one_element_decompositions l))
â†” pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l

x, y: A
(âˆƒ x0 : list A * A * list A,

        map
          (Î» t : list A * A * list A,

             let (l2', e2) := y0 in
             (l1, e1, l2', e2, l3))
          (one_element_decompositions l2)))

x, y: A
pre': list A
x': A
sufx: list A
Hdecx: In (pre', x', sufx)
  (one_element_decompositions l)
Hin: In (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
  (map
     (Î» t : list A * A * list A,
        let (y, l3) := t in
        let (l2', e2) := y in
        (pre', x', l2', e2, l3))
     (one_element_decompositions sufx))

A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
pre': list A
x': A
sufx: list A
Hdecx: In (pre', x', sufx)
  (one_element_decompositions l)
Hin: âˆƒ x0 : list A * A * list A,
  (let (y, l3) := x0 in
   let (l2', e2) := y in (pre', x', l2', e2, l3)) =
  (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
  âˆ§ In x0 (one_element_decompositions sufx)
pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l

    
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
pre': list A
x': A
sufx: list A
Hdecx: In (pre', x', sufx)
  (one_element_decompositions l)
mid': list A
y': A
suf': list A
Hdec: (pre', x', mid', y', suf') =
(pre, x, mid, y, suf)
Hin: In (mid', y', suf')
  (one_element_decompositions sufx)
pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l

    
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
pre': list A
x': A
sufx: list A
Hdecx: In (pre', x', sufx)
  (one_element_decompositions l)
mid': list A
y': A
suf': list A
Hdec: (pre', x', mid', y', suf') =
(pre, x, mid, y, suf)
Hin: In (mid', y', suf')
  (one_element_decompositions sufx)
H0: pre' = pre
H1: x' = x
H2: mid' = mid
H3: y' = y
H4: suf' = suf
pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l
 
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
sufx: list A
Hdecx: In (pre, x, sufx)
  (one_element_decompositions l)
Hin: In (mid, y, suf)
  (one_element_decompositions sufx)
Hdec: (pre, x, mid, y, suf) = (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l
 
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
sufx: list A
Hdecx: In (pre, x, sufx)
  (one_element_decompositions l)
Hin: In (mid, y, suf)
  (one_element_decompositions sufx)
pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l

    
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
sufx: list A
Hdecx: pre ++ [x] ++ sufx = l
Hin: In (mid, y, suf)
  (one_element_decompositions sufx)
pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l

    
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
sufx: list A
Hdecx: pre ++ [x] ++ sufx = l
Hin: mid ++ [y] ++ suf = sufx
pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l

    by subst.
  
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
pre ++ [x] ++ mid ++ [y] ++ suf = l
â†’ âˆƒ x0 : list A * A * list A,
    In x0 (one_element_decompositions l)
    âˆ§ In (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
        (let (y, l2) := x0 in
         let (l1, e1) := y in
         map
           (Î» t : list A * A * list A,
              let (y0, l3) := t in
              let (l2', e2) := y0 in
              (l1, e1, l2', e2, l3))
           (one_element_decompositions l2))
 
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
sufx: list A
Heqsufx: sufx = mid ++ [y] ++ suf
pre ++ [x] ++ sufx = l
â†’ âˆƒ x0 : list A * A * list A,
    In x0 (one_element_decompositions l)
    âˆ§ In (pre, x, mid, y, suf)

         let (l1, e1) := y in

           (Î» t : list A * A * list A,
              let (y0, l3) := t in
              let (l2', e2) := y0 in
              (l1, e1, l2', e2, l3))
           (one_element_decompositions l2))

sufx: list A

âˆƒ x0 : list A * A * list A,

A: Type

x, y: A
sufx: list A
Heqsufx: sufx = mid ++ [y] ++ suf
H: In (pre, x, sufx) (one_element_decompositions l)
âˆƒ x0 : list A * A * list A,
  (let (y, l3) := x0 in
   let (l2', e2) := y in (pre, x, l2', e2, l3)) =
  (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
  âˆ§ In x0 (one_element_decompositions sufx)
 
A: Type
l, pre, mid, suf: list A
x, y: A
sufx: list A
Heqsufx: sufx = mid ++ [y] ++ suf
H: In (pre, x, sufx) (one_element_decompositions l)
(pre, x, mid, y, suf) = (pre, x, mid, y, suf)
âˆ§ In (mid, y, suf) (one_element_decompositions sufx)

    by rewrite in_one_element_decompositions_iff.
Qed.


A: Type
pre1, suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
Heq: pre1 ++ suf1 = pre2 ++ suf2
pre1 = pre2
âˆ¨ (âˆƒ suf1' : list A, pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1')
  âˆ¨ (âˆƒ suf2' : list A, pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2')

  âˆ¨ (âˆƒ suf2' : list A, pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2')

pre1 = pre2
âˆ¨ (âˆƒ suf1' : list A, pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1')

Heql: pre1 ++ suf1 = []
Heq: pre2 ++ suf2 = []
pre1 = pre2

    by apply app_nil in Heql as [-> ->], Heq as [-> ->].

â†’ pre1 = pre2

A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ pre1 suf1 pre2 suf2 : list A,
l = pre1 ++ suf1
â†’ l = pre2 ++ suf2
â†’ pre1 = pre2
âˆ¨ (âˆƒ suf1' : list A, pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1')
âˆ¨ (âˆƒ suf2' : list A, pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2')
pre1, suf1: list A
a2: A
pre2, suf2: list A
Heq: a :: l = (a2 :: pre2) ++ suf2
H1: l = pre1 ++ suf1
a :: pre1 = a2 :: pre2
âˆ¨ (âˆƒ suf1' : list A, a :: pre1 = (a2 :: pre2) ++ suf1')
  âˆ¨ (âˆƒ suf2' : list A,
       a2 :: pre2 = (a :: pre1) ++ suf2')

    
A: Type
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ pre1 suf1 pre2 suf2 : list A,
l = pre1 ++ suf1
â†’ l = pre2 ++ suf2
â†’ pre1 = pre2
âˆ¨ (âˆƒ suf1' : list A, pre1 = pre2 ++ suf1')
âˆ¨ (âˆƒ suf2' : list A, pre2 = pre1 ++ suf2')
pre1, suf1, pre2, suf2: list A
H1: l = pre1 ++ suf1
H2: l = pre2 ++ suf2
a :: pre1 = a :: pre2
âˆ¨ (âˆƒ suf1' : list A, a :: pre1 = (a :: pre2) ++ suf1')
  âˆ¨ (âˆƒ suf2' : list A,
       a :: pre2 = (a :: pre1) ++ suf2')

    destruct (IHl pre1 suf1 pre2 suf2 H1 H2)
          as [Heq | [[suf1' Hgt] | [suf2' Hlt]]]; subst; eauto.
Qed.


l: list nat
nz: list_max l > 0
In (list_max l) l


l: list nat
nz: list_max l > 0
In (list_max l) l

  
nz: list_max [] > 0
In (list_max []) []
a: nat
l: list nat
nz: list_max (a :: l) > 0
IHl: list_max l > 0 â†’ In (list_max l) l
In (list_max (a :: l)) (a :: l)

  
nz: list_max [] > 0
In (list_max []) []
 
nz: 0 > 0
In (list_max []) []
 lia.
  
a: nat
l: list nat
nz: list_max (a :: l) > 0
IHl: list_max l > 0 â†’ In (list_max l) l
In (list_max (a :: l)) (a :: l)
 
a: nat
l: list nat
nz: a `max` list_max l > 0
IHl: list_max l > 0 â†’ In (list_max l) l
a = a `max` list_max l âˆ¨ In (a `max` list_max l) l

    
a: nat
l: list nat
nz: a `max` list_max l > 0
IHl: list_max l > 0 â†’ In (list_max l) l
eq_leb: (a <=? list_max l) = true
a = a `max` list_max l âˆ¨ In (a `max` list_max l) l
a: nat
l: list nat
nz: a `max` list_max l > 0
IHl: list_max l > 0 â†’ In (list_max l) l
eq_leb: (a <=? list_max l) = false
a = a `max` list_max l âˆ¨ In (a `max` list_max l) l

    
a: nat
l: list nat
nz: a `max` list_max l > 0
IHl: list_max l > 0 â†’ In (list_max l) l
eq_leb: (a <=? list_max l) = true
a = a `max` list_max l âˆ¨ In (a `max` list_max l) l
 
a: nat
l: list nat
nz: a `max` list_max l > 0
IHl: list_max l > 0 â†’ In (list_max l) l
eq_leb: (a <=? list_max l) = true
H: a `max` list_max l = list_max l
a = a `max` list_max l âˆ¨ In (a `max` list_max l) l

      itauto congruence.
    
a: nat
l: list nat
nz: a `max` list_max l > 0
IHl: list_max l > 0 â†’ In (list_max l) l
eq_leb: (a <=? list_max l) = false
a = a `max` list_max l âˆ¨ In (a `max` list_max l) l
 
a: nat
l: list nat
nz: a `max` list_max l > 0
IHl: list_max l > 0 â†’ In (list_max l) l
eq_leb: (a <=? list_max l) = false
H: a `max` list_max l = a
a = a `max` list_max l âˆ¨ In (a `max` list_max l) l

      by rewrite H; left.
Qed.

Hne: l â‰  []
In (list_max l) l

Qed.
Returns all values which occur with maximum frequency in the given list. Note that these values are returned with their original multiplicity. 
Definition mode
  `{EqDecision A}
  (l : list A) : list A  :=
  let mode_value := list_max (List.map (count_occ decide_eq l) l) in
  filter (fun a => (count_occ decide_eq l a) = mode_value) l.


mode [1; 1; 2; 3; 3] = [1; 1; 3; 3]


mode [1; 1; 2; 3; 3] = [1; 1; 3; 3]
 itauto. Qed.
Computes the list suff which satisfies pref ++ suff = l or reports that no such list exists. 
Fixpoint complete_prefix
  `{EqDecision A}
  (l pref : list A) : option (list A) :=
  match l, pref with
  | l , [] => Some l
  | [], (b :: pref') => None
  | (a :: l'), (b :: pref') => match (decide_eq a b) with
                               | right _ => None
                               | _ => let res' := complete_prefix l' pref' in
                                      match res' with
                                      | None => None
                                      | Some s => Some s
                                      end
                               end
  end.


complete_prefix [1; 2; 3; 4] [1; 2] = Some [3; 4]


complete_prefix [1; 2; 3; 4] [1; 2] = Some [3; 4]
 itauto. Qed.

complete_prefix [1; 2; 3; 4] [1; 3] = None


complete_prefix [1; 2; 3; 4] [1; 3] = None
 itauto. Qed.


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
complete_prefix l [] = Some l


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
complete_prefix l [] = Some l

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: complete_prefix l [] = Some l
Some (a :: l) = Some (a :: l)

  by destruct (complete_prefix l []).
Qed.


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
l = pref ++ suff â†” complete_prefix l pref = Some suff


A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
l = pref ++ suff â†” complete_prefix l pref = Some suff

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
l = pref ++ suff â†’ complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
complete_prefix l pref = Some suff â†’ l = pref ++ suff

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref, suff: list A
l = pref ++ suff â†’ complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l, pref: list A
âˆ€ suff : list A,
  l = pref ++ suff
  â†’ complete_prefix l pref = Some suff

    
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
âˆ€ pref suff : list A,
  l = pref ++ suff
  â†’ complete_prefix l pref = Some suff

    
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
âˆ€ pref suff : list A,
  [] = pref ++ suff
  â†’ complete_prefix [] pref = Some suff
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ pref suff : list A,
  l = pref ++ suff
  â†’ complete_prefix l pref = Some suff
âˆ€ pref suff : list A,
  a :: l = pref ++ suff
  â†’ complete_prefix (a :: l) pref = Some suff

    
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
âˆ€ pref suff : list A,
  [] = pref ++ suff
  â†’ complete_prefix [] pref = Some suff
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
pref, suff: list A
H: [] = pref ++ suff
complete_prefix [] pref = Some suff
 
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
pref, suff: list A
H: [] = pref ++ suff
match pref with
| [] => Some []
| _ :: _ => None
end = Some suff

      by destruct pref, suff.

Computes the list pref which satisfies pref ++ suff = l or reports that no such list exists. 
Definition complete_suffix
  `{EqDecision A}
  (l suff : list A) : option (list A) :=
  let res := complete_prefix (rev l) (rev suff) in
  match res with
  | None => None
  | Some ls => Some (rev ls)
  end.


complete_suffix [1; 2; 3; 4] [3; 4] = Some [1; 2]


complete_suffix [1; 2; 3; 4] [3; 4] = Some [1; 2]
 itauto. Qed.

  | None => None
  end = Some pref

l: list A
Some (rev (rev l)) = Some l

  
A: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision A
l: list A
rev (rev l) = l

  apply rev_involutive.
Qed.
elements belonging to first type in a list of a sum type 
Definition list_sum_project_left
  {A B : Type}
  (x : list (A + B))
  : list A
  :=
  map_option sum_project_left x.
elements belonging to second type in a list of a sum type 
Definition list_sum_project_right
  {A B : Type}
  (x : list (A + B))
  : list B
  :=
  map_option sum_project_right x.


l: list bool
foldr andb false l = false


l: list bool
foldr andb false l = false

  
a: bool
l: list bool
IHl: foldr andb false l = false
foldr andb false (a :: l) = false

  
a: bool
l: list bool
IHl: foldr andb false l = false
a && foldr andb false l = false
 
a: bool
l: list bool
IHl: foldr andb false l = false
a && false = false
 apply andb_false_r.
Qed.

A: Type
P, Q: A â†’ Prop
(âˆ€ x : A, {P x} + {Q x})
â†’ âˆ€ l : list A, {Forall P l} + {Exists Q l}


A: Type
P, Q: A â†’ Prop
(âˆ€ x : A, {P x} + {Q x})
â†’ âˆ€ l : list A, {Forall P l} + {Exists Q l}

  
A: Type
P, Q: A â†’ Prop
X: âˆ€ x : A, {P x} + {Q x}
{Forall P []} + {Exists Q []}
A: Type
P, Q: A â†’ Prop
X: âˆ€ x : A, {P x} + {Q x}
a: A
l: list A
IHl: {Forall P l} + {Exists Q l}
{Forall P (a :: l)} + {Exists Q (a :: l)}

  
A: Type
P, Q: A â†’ Prop
X: âˆ€ x : A, {P x} + {Q x}
Forall P []
A: Type
P, Q: A â†’ Prop
X: âˆ€ x : A, {P x} + {Q x}
a: A
l: list A
IHl: {Forall P l} + {Exists Q l}
{Forall P (a :: l)} + {Exists Q (a :: l)}
 
A: Type
P, Q: A â†’ Prop
X: âˆ€ x : A, {P x} + {Q x}
a: A
l: list A
IHl: {Forall P l} + {Exists Q l}
{Forall P (a :: l)} + {Exists Q (a :: l)}

  by refine (if X a then if IHl then left _ else right _ else right _); constructor.
Qed.


A: Type
f, g: A â†’ nat
l: list A
(âˆ€ a : A, In a l â†’ f a â‰¤ g a)
â†’ Exists (Î» a : A, f a < g a) l
  â†’ list_sum (map f l) < list_sum (map g l)


A: Type
f, g: A â†’ nat
l: list A
(âˆ€ a : A, In a l â†’ f a â‰¤ g a)
â†’ Exists (Î» a : A, f a < g a) l
  â†’ list_sum (map f l) < list_sum (map g l)

  
A: Type
f, g: A â†’ nat
x: A
l: list A
H: âˆ€ a : A, In a (x :: l) â†’ f a â‰¤ g a
H0: f x < g x
f x + foldr Init.Nat.add 0 (map f l) <
g x + foldr Init.Nat.add 0 (map g l)
A: Type
f, g: A â†’ nat
x: A
l: list A
H: âˆ€ a : A, In a (x :: l) â†’ f a â‰¤ g a
H0: Exists (Î» a : A, f a < g a) l
IHExists: (âˆ€ a : A, In a l â†’ f a â‰¤ g a)
â†’ list_sum (map f l) < list_sum (map g l)
f x + foldr Init.Nat.add 0 (map f l) <
g x + foldr Init.Nat.add 0 (map g l)

  
A: Type
f, g: A â†’ nat
x: A
l: list A
H: âˆ€ a : A, In a (x :: l) â†’ f a â‰¤ g a
H0: f x < g x
f x + foldr Init.Nat.add 0 (map f l) <
g x + foldr Init.Nat.add 0 (map g l)
 
A: Type
f, g: A â†’ nat
x: A
l: list A
H: âˆ€ a : A, In a (x :: l) â†’ f a â‰¤ g a
H0: f x < g x
foldr Init.Nat.add 0 (map f l)
â‰¤ foldr Init.Nat.add 0 (map g l)

    
A: Type
f, g: A â†’ nat
x, a: A
l: list A
H: âˆ€ a0 : A, In a0 (x :: a :: l) â†’ f a0 â‰¤ g a0
H0: f x < g x
IHl: (âˆ€ a : A, In a (x :: l) â†’ f a â‰¤ g a)
â†’ foldr Init.Nat.add 0 (map f l) â‰¤ foldr Init.Nat.add 0 (map g l)
f a + foldr Init.Nat.add 0 (map f l)
â‰¤ g a + foldr Init.Nat.add 0 (map g l)

    apply PeanoNat.Nat.add_le_mono; firstorder.
  
A: Type
f, g: A â†’ nat
x: A
l: list A
H: âˆ€ a : A, In a (x :: l) â†’ f a â‰¤ g a
H0: Exists (Î» a : A, f a < g a) l
IHExists: (âˆ€ a : A, In a l â†’ f a â‰¤ g a)
â†’ list_sum (map f l) < list_sum (map g l)
f x + foldr Init.Nat.add 0 (map f l) <
g x + foldr Init.Nat.add 0 (map g l)
 apply PeanoNat.Nat.add_le_lt_mono; firstorder.
Qed.
Nearly the natural induction principle for fold_left. Useful if you can think of fold_left f as transforming a list into a B â†’ B function, and can describe the effect with a P : list A â†’ relation B. The assumption Hstep could be weakened by replacing r with fold_left f l (f x a), but that isn't useful in natural examples. 
A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A â†’ B
P: list A â†’ B â†’ B â†’ Prop
Hstart: âˆ€ x : B, P [] x x
Hstep: âˆ€ (x : B) (a : A) (l : list A) (r : B),
  P l (f x a) r â†’ P (a :: l) x r
âˆ€ (l : list A) (x : B), P l x (fold_left f l x)


A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A â†’ B
P: list A â†’ B â†’ B â†’ Prop
Hstart: âˆ€ x : B, P [] x x
Hstep: âˆ€ (x : B) (a : A) (l : list A) (r : B),
  P l (f x a) r â†’ P (a :: l) x r
âˆ€ (l : list A) (x : B), P l x (fold_left f l x)

  
A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A â†’ B
P: list A â†’ B â†’ B â†’ Prop
Hstart: âˆ€ x : B, P [] x x
Hstep: âˆ€ (x : B) (a : A) (l : list A) (r : B),
  P l (f x a) r â†’ P (a :: l) x r
âˆ€ x : B, P [] x (fold_left f [] x)
A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A â†’ B
P: list A â†’ B â†’ B â†’ Prop
Hstart: âˆ€ x : B, P [] x x
Hstep: âˆ€ (x : B) (a : A) (l : list A) (r : B),
  P l (f x a) r â†’ P (a :: l) x r
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ x : B, P l x (fold_left f l x)
âˆ€ x : B, P (a :: l) x (fold_left f (a :: l) x)

  
A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A â†’ B
P: list A â†’ B â†’ B â†’ Prop
Hstart: âˆ€ x : B, P [] x x
Hstep: âˆ€ (x : B) (a : A) (l : list A) (r : B),
  P l (f x a) r â†’ P (a :: l) x r
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ x : B, P l x (fold_left f l x)
âˆ€ x : B, P (a :: l) x (fold_left f (a :: l) x)

  
A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A â†’ B
P: list A â†’ B â†’ B â†’ Prop
Hstart: âˆ€ x : B, P [] x x
Hstep: âˆ€ (x : B) (a : A) (l : list A) (r : B),
  P l (f x a) r â†’ P (a :: l) x r
a: A
l: list A
IHl: âˆ€ x : B, P l x (fold_left f l x)
x: B
P (a :: l) x (fold_left f (a :: l) x)

  apply Hstep, IHl.
Qed.
An induction principle for fold_left which decomposes the list from the right. 
A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A â†’ B
x0: B
P: list A â†’ B â†’ Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: âˆ€ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x â†’ P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
âˆ€ l : list A, P l (fold_left f l x0)


A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A â†’ B
x0: B
P: list A â†’ B â†’ Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: âˆ€ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x â†’ P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
âˆ€ l : list A, P l (fold_left f l x0)

  
A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A â†’ B
x0: B
P: list A â†’ B â†’ Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: âˆ€ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x â†’ P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
P [] (fold_left f [] x0)
A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A â†’ B
x0: B
P: list A â†’ B â†’ Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: âˆ€ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x â†’ P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
x: A
l: list A
IHl: P l (fold_left f l x0)
P (l ++ [x]) (fold_left f (l ++ [x]) x0)

  
A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A â†’ B
x0: B
P: list A â†’ B â†’ Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: âˆ€ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x â†’ P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
P [] (fold_left f [] x0)
 apply Hstart.
  
A, B: Type
f: B â†’ A â†’ B
x0: B
P: list A â†’ B â†’ Prop
Hstart: P [] x0
Hstep: âˆ€ (l : list A) (a : A) (x : B),
  P l x â†’ P (l ++ [a]) (f x a)
x: A
l: list A
IHl: P l (fold_left f l x0)
P (l ++ [x]) (fold_left f (l ++ [x]) x0)
 by rewrite fold_left_app; apply Hstep.
Qed.

Section suffix_quantifiers.

Quantifiers for all suffixes

In this section we define list quantifiers similar to Streams.ForAll and Streams.Exists and prove several properties about them.
Among the definitions, the more useful are ForAllSuffix2 and ExistsSuffix2 as they allow us to quantify over relations between consecutive elements. 
Context
  [A : Type]
  (P : list A -> Prop)
  .

Inductive ExistsSuffix : list A -> Prop :=
  | SHere : forall l, P l -> ExistsSuffix l
  | SFurther : forall a l, ExistsSuffix l -> ExistsSuffix (a :: l).

Inductive ForAllSuffix : list A -> Prop :=
  | SNil : P [] -> ForAllSuffix []
  | SHereAndFurther : forall a l, P (a :: l) -> ForAllSuffix l -> ForAllSuffix (a :: l).


A: Type
P: list A â†’ Prop
âˆ€ l : list A, ForAllSuffix l â†’ P l


A: Type
P: list A â†’ Prop
âˆ€ l : list A, ForAllSuffix l â†’ P l
 by inversion 1. Qed.


A: Type
P: list A â†’ Prop
âˆ€ (a : A) (l : list A),
  ForAllSuffix (a :: l) â†’ ForAllSuffix l


A: Type
P: list A â†’ Prop
âˆ€ (a : A) (l : list A),
  ForAllSuffix (a :: l) â†’ ForAllSuffix l
 by inversion 1. Qed.


A: Type
P: list A â†’ Prop
âˆ€ (m : nat) (x : list A),
  ForAllSuffix x â†’ ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)


A: Type
P: list A â†’ Prop
âˆ€ (m : nat) (x : list A),
  ForAllSuffix x â†’ ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)

  
A: Type
P: list A â†’ Prop
H: ForAllSuffix []
ForAllSuffix []
A: Type
P: list A â†’ Prop
a: A
l: list A
H: ForAllSuffix (a :: l)
ForAllSuffix (a :: l)
A: Type
P: list A â†’ Prop
m: nat
IHm: âˆ€ x : list A, ForAllSuffix x â†’ ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)
H: ForAllSuffix []
ForAllSuffix []
A: Type
P: list A â†’ Prop
m: nat
IHm: âˆ€ x : list A, ForAllSuffix x â†’ ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)
a: A
l: list A
H: ForAllSuffix (a :: l)
ForAllSuffix (list_suffix l m)
 
A: Type
P: list A â†’ Prop
m: nat
IHm: âˆ€ x : list A, ForAllSuffix x â†’ ForAllSuffix (list_suffix x m)
a: A
l: list A
H: ForAllSuffix (a :: l)
ForAllSuffix (list_suffix l m)

  by apply fsFurther in H; apply IHm.
Qed.


A: Type
P, Inv: list A â†’ Prop
InvThenP: âˆ€ l : list A, Inv l â†’ P l
InvIsStable: âˆ€ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) â†’ Inv l
âˆ€ l : list A, Inv l â†’ ForAllSuffix l


A: Type

InvIsStable: âˆ€ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) â†’ Inv l
âˆ€ l : list A, Inv l â†’ ForAllSuffix l

  
A: Type
P, Inv: list A â†’ Prop

InvIsStable: âˆ€ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) â†’ Inv l
H: Inv []
ForAllSuffix []

  Inv (a :: l) â†’ Inv l

IHl: Inv l â†’ ForAllSuffix l
H: Inv (a :: l)
ForAllSuffix (a :: l)

InvIsStable: âˆ€ (a : A) (l : list A),
  Inv (a :: l) â†’ Inv l
H: Inv []
ForAllSuffix []
 by constructor; apply InvThenP.

  Inv (a :: l) â†’ Inv l

ForAllSuffix (a :: l)

  Inv (a :: l) â†’ Inv l

A: Type
P, Inv: list A â†’ Prop

  Inv (a :: l) â†’ Inv l

A: Type
P, Inv: list A â†’ Prop

  Inv (a :: l) â†’ Inv l
a: A
l: list A
IHl: Inv l â†’ ForAllSuffix l
H: Inv (a :: l)
ForAllSuffix l
 by eapply IHl, InvIsStable.
Qed.

End suffix_quantifiers.


A: Type
P, Q: list A â†’ Prop
HPQ: âˆ€ l : list A, P l â†’ Q l
âˆ€ l : list A, ForAllSuffix P l â†’ ForAllSuffix Q l


A: Type
P, Q: list A â†’ Prop
HPQ: âˆ€ l : list A, P l â†’ Q l
âˆ€ l : list A, ForAllSuffix P l â†’ ForAllSuffix Q l

  induction 1; constructor; auto.
Qed.

Definition ForAllSuffix1 [A : Type] (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop :=
  ForAllSuffix (fun l => match l with | [] => True | a :: _ => P a end).


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
âˆ€ l : list A, ForAllSuffix1 P l â†” Forall P l


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
âˆ€ l : list A, ForAllSuffix1 P l â†” Forall P l

  split; induction 1; constructor; auto.
Qed.

Definition ExistsSuffix1 [A : Type] (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop :=
  ExistsSuffix (fun l => match l with | [] => False | a :: _ => P a end).


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
âˆ€ l : list A, ExistsSuffix1 P l â†” Exists P l


A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
âˆ€ l : list A, ExistsSuffix1 P l â†” Exists P l

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
l: list A
H: match l with
| [] => False
| a :: _ => P a
end
Exists P l
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
a: A
l: list A
H: ExistsSuffix
  (Î» l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => False
     | a :: _ => P a
     end) l
IHExistsSuffix: Exists P l
Exists P (a :: l)
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
x: A
l: list A
H: P x
ExistsSuffix1 P (x :: l)
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
x: A
l: list A
H: Exists P l
IHExists: ExistsSuffix1 P l
ExistsSuffix1 P (x :: l)

  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
l: list A
H: match l with
| [] => False
| a :: _ => P a
end
Exists P l
 by destruct l; [| left].
  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
a: A
l: list A
H: ExistsSuffix
  (Î» l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => False
     | a :: _ => P a
     end) l
IHExistsSuffix: Exists P l
Exists P (a :: l)
 by right.
  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
x: A
l: list A
H: P x
ExistsSuffix1 P (x :: l)
 by left.
  
A: Type
P: A â†’ Prop
x: A
l: list A
H: Exists P l
IHExists: ExistsSuffix1 P l
ExistsSuffix1 P (x :: l)
 by right.
Qed.

Definition ForAllSuffix2 [A : Type] (R : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop :=
  ForAllSuffix (fun l => match l with | a :: b :: _ => R a b | _ => True end).


A: Type
R: A â†’ A â†’ Prop
HT: Transitive R
âˆ€ (a b : A) (l : list A),
  ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: b :: l)
  â†’ ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)


A: Type
R: A â†’ A â†’ Prop
HT: Transitive R
âˆ€ (a b : A) (l : list A),
  ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: b :: l)
  â†’ ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)

  
A: Type
R: A â†’ A â†’ Prop
HT: Transitive R
a, b: A
l: list A
H: ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: b :: l)
a0: A
l0: list A
H2: R a b
H3: ForAllSuffix
  (Î» l : list A,
     match l with
     | [] => True
     | [a] => True
     | a :: b :: _ => R a b
     end) (b :: l)
H0: a0 = a
H1: l0 = b :: l
ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)

a, b: A

     | [] => True

 by repeat constructor.

    by transitivity b.
Qed.


A: Type

HT: Transitive R
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
âˆ€ l : list A,
  ForAllSuffix2 R l â†’ ForAllSuffix2 R (filter P l)

  (if decide (P a)
   then a :: filter P l
   else filter P l)

match filter P l with
| [] => True
| b :: _ => R a b
end

A: Type

a, a0: A
l: list A
Hl: ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: a0 :: l)
IHl: ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)
â†’ match filter P l with
  | [] => True
  | b :: _ => R a b
  end
match
  (if decide (P a0)
   then a0 :: filter P l
   else filter P l)
with
| [] => True
| b :: _ => R a b
end

  
A: Type
R: A â†’ A â†’ Prop
HT: Transitive R
P: A â†’ Prop
Pdec: âˆ€ a : A, Decision (P a)
a, a0: A
l: list A

IHl: ForAllSuffix2 R (a :: l)
â†’ match filter P l with
  | [] => True
  | b :: _ => R a b
  end
H: P a0
R a a0

âˆ€ (A : Type) (l m n : list A), l âŠ† m â†’ m âŠ† n â†’ l âŠ† n

  by apply Hmn, Hlm.
Qed.

A: Type
âˆ€ l1 l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ NoDup l1

âˆ€ l1 l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ NoDup l1

  
A: Type
l2: list A
H: NoDup ([] ++ l2)
NoDup []
A: Type

IHl1: âˆ€ l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ NoDup l1

NoDup (a :: l1)

  
A: Type
l2: list A
H: NoDup ([] ++ l2)
NoDup []
 constructor.
  
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A

l2: list A
H: NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
NoDup (a :: l1)
 
A: Type
a: A
l1: list A
IHl1: âˆ€ l2 : list A, NoDup (l1 ++ l2) â†’ NoDup l1
l2: list A
H: NoDup ((a :: l1) ++ l2)
x: A
l: list A

H3: NoDup (l1 ++ l2)
H0: x = a
H1: l = l1 ++ l2
NoDup (a :: l1)

a: A

a âˆˆ l1 ++ l2

    by apply elem_of_app; left.
Qed.


A: Type
âˆ€ l : list A, l âŠ† [] â†’ l = []

  inversion H.

A: Type

A: Type
l1, l2: list A

length l1 â‰¤ length l2


A: Type

length l1 â‰¤ length l2

  by apply submseteq_length, NoDup_submseteq.
Qed.


A: Type
x: A
l1, l2: list A
x :: l1 âŠ†+ l2 â†’ l1 âŠ†+ l2


A: Type
x: A
l1, l2: list A
x :: l1 âŠ†+ l2 â†’ l1 âŠ†+ l2

  by apply submseteq_trans, submseteq_cons.
Qed.


A: Type
l1, l2: list A
l1 âŠ†+ l2 â†’ l1 âŠ† l2


A: Type
l1, l2: list A
l1 âŠ†+ l2 â†’ l1 âŠ† l2

  by intros H ? Hx; eapply elem_of_submseteq.
Qed.


âˆ€ (A : Type) (n : nat) (l l' : list A) (x : A),
  take n l = l' ++ [x] â†’ âˆƒ n' : nat, n = S n'


âˆ€ (A : Type) (n : nat) (l l' : list A) (x : A),
  take n l = l' ++ [x] â†’ âˆƒ n' : nat, n = S n'

  
A: Type
l, l': list A
x: A
H: take 0 l = l' ++ [x]
âˆƒ n' : nat, 0 = S n'
A: Type
n': nat
IHn': âˆ€ (l l' : list A) (x : A),
  take n' l = l' ++ [x]
  â†’ âˆƒ n'0 : nat, n' = S n'0
l, l': list A
x: A
H: take (S n') l = l' ++ [x]
âˆƒ n'0 : nat, S n' = S n'0

  
A: Type
l, l': list A
x: A
H: take 0 l = l' ++ [x]
âˆƒ n' : nat, 0 = S n'
 
A: Type
l, l': list A
x: A
take 0 l â‰  l' ++ [x]
 
A: Type
l, l': list A
x: A
[] â‰  l' ++ [x]
 apply app_cons_not_nil.
  
A: Type
n': nat
IHn': âˆ€ (l l' : list A) (x : A),
  take n' l = l' ++ [x]
  â†’ âˆƒ n'0 : nat, n' = S n'0
l, l': list A
x: A
H: take (S n') l = l' ++ [x]
âˆƒ n'0 : nat, S n' = S n'0
 by exists n'.
Qed.


âˆ€ (A B : Type) (x : A) (y : B) (la : list A) (lb : 
                                              list B),
  (x, y) âˆˆ list_prod la lb â†” x âˆˆ la âˆ§ y âˆˆ lb


âˆ€ (A B : Type) (x : A) (y : B) (la : list A) (lb : 
                                              list B),
  (x, y) âˆˆ list_prod la lb â†” x âˆˆ la âˆ§ y âˆˆ lb

  
A, B: Type
x: A
y: B
la: list A
lb: list B
(x, y) âˆˆ list_prod la lb â†” x âˆˆ la âˆ§ y âˆˆ lb

  by rewrite elem_of_list_In, in_prod_iff, <- !elem_of_list_In.
Qed.

The function lastn and its properties

lastn returns a suffix of length n from the list l. 
Definition lastn {A : Type} (n : nat) (l : list A) : list A :=
  rev (firstn n (rev l)).
If the list is [], then the result of lastn is also []. 
âˆ€ (A : Type) (n : nat), lastn n [] = []


âˆ€ (A : Type) (n : nat), lastn n [] = []

  by intros A n; unfold lastn; cbn; rewrite firstn_nil.
Qed.
If n is zero, then the result of lastn is []. 
âˆ€ (A : Type) (l : list A), lastn 0 l = []


âˆ€ (A : Type) (l : list A), lastn 0 l = []

  by intros A l; unfold lastn; rewrite take_0.
Qed.
If n is greater than the length of the list, lastn returns the whole list. 
âˆ€ (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A),
  length l â‰¤ n â†’ lastn n l = l


âˆ€ (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A),
  length l â‰¤ n â†’ lastn n l = l

  
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
Hge: length l â‰¤ n
lastn n l = l

  
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
Hge: length l â‰¤ n
rev (take n (rev l)) = l

  
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
Hge: length l â‰¤ n
rev (rev l) = l
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
Hge: length l â‰¤ n
length (rev l) â‰¤ n

  
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
Hge: length l â‰¤ n
rev (rev l) = l
 by rewrite rev_involutive.
  
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
Hge: length l â‰¤ n
length (rev l) â‰¤ n
 by rewrite rev_length.
Qed.
lastn skips the prefix of the list as long as the suffix is long enough. 
âˆ€ (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A),
  n â‰¤ length l2 â†’ lastn n (l1 ++ l2) = lastn n l2


âˆ€ (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A),
  n â‰¤ length l2 â†’ lastn n (l1 ++ l2) = lastn n l2

  
A: Type
n: nat
l1, l2: list A
Hlt: n â‰¤ length l2
lastn n (l1 ++ l2) = lastn n l2

  
A: Type
n: nat
l1, l2: list A
Hlt: n â‰¤ length l2
rev (take n (rev (l1 ++ l2))) = rev (take n (rev l2))

  
A: Type
n: nat
l1, l2: list A
Hlt: n â‰¤ length l2
n â‰¤ length (rev l2)

  by rewrite rev_length; lia.
Qed.
lastn either skips the head of the list or not, depending on how big a suffix we want. 
âˆ€ (A : Type) (n : nat) (h : A) (t : list A),
  lastn n (h :: t) =
  (if decide (S (length t) â‰¤ n)
   then h :: t
   else lastn n t)


âˆ€ (A : Type) (n : nat) (h : A) (t : list A),
  lastn n (h :: t) =
  (if decide (S (length t) â‰¤ n)
   then h :: t
   else lastn n t)

  
A: Type
n: nat
h: A
t: list A
lastn n (h :: t) =
(if decide (S (length t) â‰¤ n)
 then h :: t
 else lastn n t)

  
A: Type
n: nat
h: A
t: list A
H: S (length t) â‰¤ n
lastn n (h :: t) = h :: t
A: Type
n: nat
h: A
t: list A
H: Â¬ S (length t) â‰¤ n
lastn n (h :: t) = lastn n t

  
A: Type
n: nat
h: A
t: list A
H: S (length t) â‰¤ n
lastn n (h :: t) = h :: t
 by rewrite lastn_ge; cbn; [| lia].
  
A: Type
n: nat
h: A
t: list A
H: Â¬ S (length t) â‰¤ n
lastn n (h :: t) = lastn n t
 by rewrite (lastn_app_le _ [h] t); [| lia].
Qed.
If l1 is a prefix of l2, then the reverse of l1 is a suffix of l2. 
âˆ€ (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A),
  l1 `prefix_of` l2 â†’ rev l1 `suffix_of` rev l2


âˆ€ (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A),
  l1 `prefix_of` l2 â†’ rev l1 `suffix_of` rev l2

  
A: Type
l1, l: list A
rev l1 `suffix_of` rev (l1 ++ l)

  
A: Type
l1, l: list A
rev l1 `suffix_of` rev l ++ rev l1

  by exists (rev l).
Qed.
If n1 is less than (or equal to) n2, then lastn n1 l is shorter than lastn n2 l and therefore is its suffix. 
âˆ€ (A : Type) (l : list A) (n1 n2 : nat),
  n1 â‰¤ n2 â†’ lastn n1 l `suffix_of` lastn n2 l


âˆ€ (A : Type) (l : list A) (n1 n2 : nat),
  n1 â‰¤ n2 â†’ lastn n1 l `suffix_of` lastn n2 l

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hle: n1 â‰¤ n2
lastn n1 l `suffix_of` lastn n2 l

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hle: n1 â‰¤ n2
rev (take n1 (rev l))
`suffix_of` rev (take n2 (rev l))

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hle: n1 â‰¤ n2
take n1 (rev l) `prefix_of` take n2 (rev l)

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hle: n1 â‰¤ n2
take n2 (rev l) =
take n1 (rev l) ++ take (n2 - n1) (drop n1 (rev l))

  
A: Type
l: list A
n1, n2: nat
Hle: n1 â‰¤ n2
take n2 (rev l) = take (n1 + (n2 - n1)) (rev l)

  by f_equal; lia.
Qed.
The length of lastn n l is the smaller of n and the length of l. 
âˆ€ (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A),
  length (lastn n l) = n `min` length l


âˆ€ (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A),
  length (lastn n l) = n `min` length l

  
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
length (lastn n l) = n `min` length l

  
A: Type
n: nat
l: list A
length (rev (take n (rev l))) = n `min` length l

  by rewrite rev_length, take_length, rev_length.
Qed.

Program Definition not_null_element
  `{EqDecision A} [l : list A] (Hl : l <> []) : dsig (fun i => i âˆˆ l) :=
    dexist (is_Some_proj (proj2 (head_is_Some l) Hl)) _.

âˆ€ A : Type,
  EqDecision A
  â†’ âˆ€ (l : list A) (Hl : l â‰  []),
      (Î» i : A, i âˆˆ l)
        (is_Some_proj (proj2 (head_is_Some l) Hl))

  by intros A ? [| h t] ?; [| left].
Qed.

Program Definition element_of_subseteq
  `{EqDecision A} [l1 l2 : list A] (Hsub : l1 âŠ† l2)
  (di : dsig (fun i => i âˆˆ l1)) : dsig (fun i => i âˆˆ l2) :=
    dexist (` di) _.

âˆ€ (A : Type) (EqDecision0 : EqDecision A) (l1
                                           l2 : list A),
  l1 âŠ† l2
  â†’ âˆ€ di : dsig (Î» i : A, i âˆˆ l1),
      (Î» i : A, i âˆˆ l2) (`di)

  by intros; cbn; destruct_dec_sig di i Hi Heq; subst; apply Hsub.
Qed.

Definition element_of_filter
  `{EqDecision A} [P : A -> Prop] `{âˆ€ x, Decision (P x)} [l : list A]
  : dsig (fun i => i âˆˆ filter P l) -> dsig (fun i => i âˆˆ l) :=
  element_of_subseteq (list_filter_subseteq P l).
